1.content:
"Chuckle's Joke Shop?" you say as you see a new store in the center of town. "Never seen this place before!"

You open the door and a bell rings as you enter. There doesn't seem to be anyone in the store at all.

"Hello!" you say as you try to see if someone is there. No response comes, so you venture into the store. Lots of funny joke props sit on the shelves, as well as gag gifts.

"Interesting place" you say to no one as you walk to the back of the store. You then see something very strange, a door...a door with a green glow coming from behind it...

Opening the door blinds you with the light...and when the light subsides, you...are no longer in the store. You are standing in the middle of field.

"What in the...where am I?!" you say as you note a city in the distance!

Before the adventure begins, however...are you
1.title: The Joke Shop and the Portal

choices: A little clown car drives up
Two guys in tights approach you
You hear a lion roar nearby
11.content:
You look down and realize you are male. You don't realize that you've got mail. That's an entirely different movie.

Holy Smokes! you think, the jokes are starting already. This desolate field must be somewhere in Clown World. You look around and wonder if you are the only one here.

After a few minutes of standing alone in an open field you began to wonder if you made the right choice. But then...
11.title: Male

choices: A menagerie of girl clowns pop out!
3 circus guy clowns and one sexy circus female ring leader come out!
111.content:
A ridiculously tiny two-door old school VW Beetle enters the scene! It startles you a bit as it came out of nowhere, and since it's the only thing that's happening on this field, you fix your sight on it. It's so tiny, it's cartoonish! You'd think it could be some sort of remote controlled toy. It's pink, with bright yellow polka dots and blue little flowery dots coloring it. It drives past you at first but then it suddenly stops and turns around to where you are again. It makes a turn as it reaches you and it circles you for a couple of spins, then it finally stops.

The car doors open...
111.title: Ooooh turn around! Turn around! Turn around!

choices: Tied up to a pole on a circus tent.
Tied up to a make-up chair in a dressing room.
1111.content:
You are surprised to see that this tiny thing was not a toy, somebody was inside it! Then you look around trying to figure how is all this happening. You're in the middle of a field, don't they use trap doors in the circus for this sort of thing?

You see that the figure that pops out of the car is female, a very silly looking whiteface clown woman in a purple and green doll dress with a motif of blue flowers all over it, with a huge set of corkscrew purple curls and a cute little blue bow sitting on top. She runs straight at you, beaming with a smile. You smile back as it can't be helped and say: "Heh, hi..."

But you notice more movement coming from the vehicle, another clown comes out, and it's another woman. This one an Auguste with red curls wearing a white doll dress with red polka dots all over it and a blue vest. Then another one, again female, whiteface with yellow curls this time, red doll dress. You couldn't help but notice this one b/c she looked...kinda huge. You figure there's always a really fat one on every group of clowns, this was no different...until you look at how she reaches for something in the car, and what pops out is another fat whitefaced woman, a little smaller than the first one, in a yellow doll dress and light blue curls. She popped out so suddenly that she hit her friend and they both comically fell down on the floor.

As they approach, you turn around to talk to the clown that came out first, but instead you get in your face the Auguste girl staring at you with an exaggerated clown's grinning look on her face and she jumps up and down all giddy. The first clown has been doing the same, and their 2 fat friends join in with complete glee.

"So cute! So cute!" you hear.
"Oh Cake, let's take him home right now! I just wanna eat him up!"
"He is such a hubby!"
"Oh Pollyanna, can we please please please please please pllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllease take him with us??" you hear. And you instinctively freak out.

"Why, how adorable, absolutely!" comes from behind you, it seemed on a normal tone. All the girls squeaked like clowns normally do, but this one didn't squeak, and you didn't hear any of them squeak that. That's when you feel it, a very soft silk fabric on your back. And arms wrap around you, fine gloved hand puts a handkerchief in your face. It doesn't cover your eyes, you get a look at who's doing this. Another clown woman, this one white, but as a blue Pierrot with a puffy duffel on her neck. This was scaring you to no end, but you saw as there was no malice as she was doing this. She looks at you with a very innocent smile. Her fiery red lips kiss you goodnight.

You wake up...
1111.title: Look what I found!

11111.content:
Somebody is kissing you. You hear a rise of laughter. Then a honk. You wake up, you're in a seated position. There's that fat clown again right in your face, she forces on you a big fat comical cartoon kiss, huge waves of laughter respond to this. You can't move, your hands are tied.

Then suddenly, whatever you're seating on bumps up. The clown falls back, landing on her back lifting her doll skirt revealing the big clown bloomers. The audience laughs hysterically and a spotlight is right on top of you, you discover you're at the center stage of a circus tied up to a pole sitting on a trapeze.

The music then starts, the rest of the clown girls prance in holding items like combs, spray cans, hair driers, and even tool boxes. They coo at you and continue to prance and curtsy at the strangely mostly adult audience.

You slide your way up to stand and look around, then the Pierrot comes in and marches straight at you giggling and blowing you kisses, she's holding some kind of suit wrapped in plastic on a clothes hanger. The lights go out but you can still see what's happening, Pierrot joins you on the trapeze tossing the suit at one of her friends seemingly now standing by and faces you. Suddenly, your hands become free.

Pierrot kisses you. She simply dove her head into yours and kissed you.

You are shocked and ready to run, but suddenly, entranced. Your lips agree with hers. You slowly lift your arms and wrap them around her body, she does the same more confidently and romantically.

It's a prolonged romantic kiss that goes on for a few minutes where you feel nothing but bliss. Until it stops. Your arms go down, you are still standing but you can't move your body. She's chuckling, reaching for a microphone. "Hm hm well, that was sweet!" - she says to you, she puts an arm over your frozen shoulders. "But that was it! From here on out you'll be too busy making the world happy to have time for romance!"

The lights turn on. "Llllllllladies and gentlemen! We will now treat you to the amazing and mysterious art of transformation! Behold!" - with that, all the clowns lunged at you. Nobody in the audience can see what they're doing to you, how exactly they're using all their tools, and what will the result be. They get to find out first though, and they burst out in the biggest laughter you've ever had at your expense. Pierrot then gets a huge mirror and presents you with what you've been turned into.

You've become...
11111.title: Tied up to a pole on a circus tent.

111111.content: But you're still you, right??
111111.title: Honk honk!

111112.content: So...*gulp*, what do you look like??
111112.title: Great, another TG Circus!

1111122.title: Yes, that's you in the mirror.

11112.content:
Somebody is kissing you. It's a very big kiss, very smooth and romantic at first. But then they overdo it, due to its length, it turns into a joke fast. You wake up, Pierrot is in front of you. She kissed you up.

"Sorry about that." she says. "We don't get many people here and we didn't want you to run."

"It's okay." you reply. "It just freaked me out a bit. Didn't see you come out of that car."

She giggles a bit and steps away, walks off from your sight for a moment. As you are lying down you notice her costume is actually a bit more puffier and baggier than you thought, but she sure had an angel's face on her. And what a way to wake you up, you start thinking there's gonna be an awesome payoff the minute she takes that thing off.

"Is he up, isheupisheupisheup!?" you hear booming.

"Ah crap, this I'm not gonna like." you think as you suspect what's coming up next. And you were unfortunately right, four clowns walk in to your view. They were the group of ladies from before, and they were just as happy as earlier to see you. They go to you, one by one, and they all give you a big fat comical kisses the mouth. They introduce themselves as they do:

"Rhapsie The Clown!" started the Auguste as she flew to your face and kissed you.
"Velvet The Clown! And how are you today sweetkins??" said the the first purple clown you had seen as she slowly zoomed in on you smiling and kissing you.
"Cake, The Sweetest Clown Ever! MMMMMMMMUAHH!" was the first fat clown, and as she now was giving you a mouthful of her fat clown breath, you've had enough. You tried to push her away, but your arms were restrained. You tried some kicking as you realized that and having Sweet Cake on your face but your legs were also restrained. There was no ending this.
"Pudding is here!" finished the last one. She seemed to behave a bit like a little kid, as a clown. She only pecks you with one kiss on your forehead and pokes and tickles you with much delight.

"Alright alright alright. That was fun. Nice to meet you all. Now could you guys please get me off whatever I am? I can't move." you implore. You are kissed on the cheek, Pierrot was back. She giggles: "What about me, jerk? I am Pollyanna." she says to you.

"Nice to meet you Pollyanna, now please, get me out of this." you tell her.
"Oh we just can't do that! You know how there's some clowns who'll do the exact opposite of what you tell them! We really love going for that type of act!" Pollyanna explains.
"Fine, I'll play along." you answer. "Theh heh ah Hell, have your little fun, girls." no reason to panic you guess. They may be clowns, but that doesn't change the fact that you are restrained in a room full of women! Of course, things are going to get a little bit more complex than that...

Rhapsie jumps at you with a hug and says to your just plain clueless face: "Oh we will, baby! We will!" She backs up lifting you and you get a clearer idea of where you are. Sitting in front of a rainbow colored theater make-up mirror on what seems to be a very cartoony clowns only dressing room.

"Okay girls! Let's get started!" said Pollyanna, all the clowns cheered on.
"Brace yourself handsome..." said Rhapsie as everyone including yourself looked at the mirror. "Cuz we are going to make you into..."
11112.title: Tied up to a make-up chair in a dressing room.

111121.content:
"...an adorable little clown baby!" exclaimed Rhapsie, making all the other clowns in the room rejoice.

"Oh I just can't wait to play with you!" said Pudding in her cheerful tone, joined by Cake "Let's do it already so I can eat him up in kisses again!"

"Ha ha, you want age play? I'm down with that." you tell them feeling cool and ready for what you think it's a fun time role playing with these girls. "I'm so happy to hear that." Pollyanna answers you "We're going to make you into the most cutest and most adorable baby clown. It's going to be so fun. You're going to be a baby again, no more work, no more responsibilities. No more trying to act so mature and forget about scoring a good looking girlfriend, because you're going to be a baby again."

You smile, this clown is actually starting to make you feel hot. She looks at you very carefully, always smiling.

"Now let's get started. Repeat after me: Goo goo!" she instructs you.
"Goo goo!" you do as she says.
"Daa daa!" she said then.
"Daa daa!" you repeat.
"Boo boo!" came next.
"Boo boo!" you're still with her.
"Baa baa!" came last.
"Baa baa!" but you could do this all day. And you will.

"Okay, we're done with that! Velvet, your turn!" said Pollyanna after she had finished a small part of your transformation. Velvet was next, your make-up chair folds again and you're facing this clown lying down.

"Did you have fun with Pollyanna sweetie??" asked Velvet in her friendly clown tone.
"Daa daa!" you answer, this is fun! You're getting into it! But...you could've sworn you're not that deep into character, at least not yet. And you were really about to say "Oh yeah girl, that left me so hard, please tell me you're gonna suck this off now!" you naughty little boy. But still...

"Baa baa! Daa daa, boo boo!" you couldn't stop.
"Okay, you little baby, Polly will play with you again later on! I promise! But first..."

What does Velvet get to do for your transformation??
111121.title: Let's talk baby!

1111211.content:
"Haircut time!" exclaimed Velvet and you panic a little bit, you're not sure how to cope with getting your hair done over this. You then feel a draft from top to bottom, your clothes are gone. And then you hear an electric shaver. Velvet walks up to you with it, it looks pink and as exaggerated and cartoony as the car you saw earlier. Of course earlier you also thought that was a toy but it wasn't, so maybe that also applied here. And it did, she passes it through your chest hair and it works like magic leaving it naked, the clown moved on to the hair on your legs and then she stopped at your crotch and shaved off all the hair around your balls.

"Awww, what's this little baby??" Velvet asked pointing at the boner playing with Pollyanna had given you.
"Goo goo?" you...asked?
"You're a little baby now! This is something big boys do!" she explains to you.
"Don't worry Velvet! As soon as your done we'll give the baby a bath and we'll fix that in a jiffy!" you hear Pudding tell her.
"Oh, I better hurry up then!" she says and then the worse part came, she takes the electric shaver to the hair on your head.
"Boo boo boo, daa, gaa gaa!" you...demand her to stop, this is kinda going too far, you don't want a haircut right now! And if she leaves you bald like the rest of your body, how are you going to explain it to your friends? Speaking of which, how can you even explain to them anything if you keep talking baby gibberish? Something being off here is an understatement. You feel the shaver pounding on top of you, you see lots of your hair just flying off, and you just resign thinking they just need a bald clown real bad. Okay, let's just look past this...

"There!" said Velvet then she reached for something on the table where the make-up mirror sat "And now for the fun part!" she pats on your head, there actually seems to be some hair left, and she empties a bottle of what looks like shampoo on it and scrubs it good with it. Out of nowhere, you hear a faucet, and a hose comes up and Velvet rinses what's left of your hair.

Finally, she passes a towel around it and reaches for a pink little lacy silk cloth and ties it on your hair. The seat is lifted, you look in the mirror and you are horrified at what the clown had done to you. What's left of your hair was just a small strand in the middle, in baby blue color with a cute little pink bow on top of it. You look so silly.

"Baa! Goo goo goo!" means you freaked out, but that's the best we can make out.
"Oh! He looks so cute! Velvet that's just perfect!" said Pudding.
"Ha ha, see what I can do?? And don't you just love it, little baby? You look much better now! And we're just getting warmed up!" said Velvet in a really accomplished tone.
"Baby clown voice, baby clown hair...Cake, are you ready with..."

What does Cake get to do for your transformation??
1111211.title: Your new baby haircut!

choices: Time now for your Baby Formula!
11112111.content:
Cake, are you ready with the bath?? It's time to give him his smooth baby clown skin! And I want my turn with him already!" said Pudding excited.
"Bath time!" Cake declared from a distance.

Suddenly, the restraints came off and you were free. You instinctively ran, away from the mirror, away from these crazy clowns. A wig and some make up and a diaper would've been fun, but you somehow feel this game got too real with this embarrassing haircut. Two doors in front of you, you enter the nearest one, and you made a big mistake. It's the bathroom, and Cake was waiting for you with arms wide open. With no hesitation she gets a hold of you and gives you one of her big fat clown smooches in the mouth.

"Well don't you look even more delicious??" she says to you as she tosses you into a bubble bath in a round tub that was inside a bathroom that looked as cartoony as the room you had just escaped from. The bubbles confuse you, you don't know where you landed. Then you feel Cake's grip again, and she lifts you up in the surface while holding a big puffy red sponge shaped like a bow.

"Hold still now baby! This shouldn't take long to work!" Cake said as she began to scrub every part of your body she could get a hold of. You attempt to struggle, but she's just so strong! As she scrubs she rinses and as she rinses, your skin gets more and more pale. This continues until you're literally snow white from it. Just when it looks like she's done, she gets a good grip on your mysteriously still erected penis.

"Oooh, boy that Velvet sure wasn't lying! Pudding..."

What does Pudding get to do for your transformation??
11112111.title: Bath time!

111121112.content:
"Pudding, diaper him already!" Cake said.
"Okie dokie!" you hear Pudding go, and in an instant, you're out of the bath and back in the dressing room by way of Pudding holding you in place. She sits you down on the floor on top of a thick white blanket, she's about to diaper you with it.

"Okay baby, this is going to be your diaper! And this is the pin that's going to hold it in place!" Pudding shows you a very large and clown prop of a pin your big puffy diaper will be held on with, but that's not all...

"This is Mr. Joy! This is gonna make sure you're our little baby forever and ever!" she now held to your sight what looked like a deflated yellow balloon, she started blowing air into it with her mouth, it looked like a tube with a very goofy smile as it took form! She grabs your boner and fits this tube balloon into it. You stand up feeling incredibly uneasy, something's happening, it's doing something. First it deflates, reshaping your penis into a deflated balloon! But then it inflates again, you're suddenly excited, as this balloon grows and the goofy smile comes up again you start feeling a jolt of pleasure and joy. This was Mr. Joy doing his work as your new penis, and this giant balloon was so much better making you feel as big as a horse.

You're smiling. You lie down looking up feeling elated, this is the best thing that's ever happened to you. But you fall on your diaper. "Goo goo?" you ask right away while looking down and all the pleasure on you had disappeared. Without noticing, Pudding had slipped it on you. She's sitting next to you giggling, and gives you a kiss in the cheek. You stand up again and look at the big puffy diaper while grabbing it. You try to rip it off, wondering if you can look again at your new endowment and why it's so well concealed by one goofy diaper, but the exaggerated pin seems to be holding everything in place like magic. You try to work with releasing the pin but you fall forward...

...into Rhapsie's arms!

What does Rhapsie get to do for your transformation??
111121112.title: Time to diaper you already!

choices: Final chapter of this bizarre tale about your babyfied clown transformation!
1111211121.content:
You are now in the hands of the playful Auguste clown Rhapsie. You almost fell to the floor by way of struggling with a big puffy diaper that was just placed on you, but this clown caught you in time. She's looking down on your body as it has gone through a rigorous baby clown transformation. Your skin has been bleached, you have a comical hairstyle, and you are in diapers. At this point, it's almost complete. Then as this one clown holds you, the music starts. It's a tune you might have heard before, a one-hit wonder from the past with a bit of an unsavory tone. But since the artists are no longer relevant and in this day and age it's harmless, nothing wrong with a bunch of clowns trying to be hip playing around with it.

"Oooh, baby, baby
Baby, baby
Oooh, baby, baby
Baby, baby!"

Yes, Salt'n Pepa's "Push it". And as you recognized that song Rhapsie started to hop with a little rhythm. She's shaking you along and making a mock dance while holding your hands and coaxing you to dance. You don't seem to be in much control but you don't completely give in, much to this clowns delight, as she continues to move along with you through another end of the room. As this happens, the other clowns minus Pollyanna are watching and dancing and hopping to the song and all of them smiling as they look on at you.

"Yay, we totally have a party going on here!" says Rhapsie to you. "Oh my clueless little baby, how do you like everything so far??"

"Goo goo? Baa baa!" you asked hoping it would be: "What do you mean clueless? What have I gotten myself into!"

"Isn't it just fun to be a clown??" asked you the female Auguste.

"Daa daa! Daa daa!" you don't know how but, you were actually agreeing.

"Now then, I'm pretty sure anyone who takes a look at you now will figure out in a heartbeat you're a clown, and a baby! As if the big silly diaper isn't gonna give it away! But still, it's actually not funny enough! The idea of you being a clown baby really needs to stick! You have to feel like one, inside..." as she said this, she reached for your crotch and you felt Mr. Joy getting a little pump. This excites you feeling all sorts of bliss, and leaving you wide open for her surprise...

"...and out!" she pushes you back immediately into a portion of the room before 3 big mirrors. She's going to give you something to wear. She walks by wheeling in a rack of assorted clown dresses and costumes and pulls out a little number for you. A light blue one piece baby puffy romper, and as soon she hands it to you, you start putting it on as if you were required to. You don't know how, but in spite of all the weirdness, you are fully complying to this. You are in your mind under the obligation to put this on now, it’s your job. As you settle both your feet into what seems to be built in booties, the costume smooths out through your bottom, hiding the big baggy diaper and the silly big pin with absolutely no signs that suggest that you might be wearing something like that and it fits itself into a firm clown shape. The sleeves of this romper are long with mittens and as you fit your hands in these you button yourself up. Rhapsie's smiling in front of you still humming “Push it” as it’s still being played in the back while tying a big comical round bonnet the same color as your romper to your head, with frills at the edges, it's what hid your silly little haircut. She then went on to tie an exaggerated huge white bib that was part of the costume. It seems pretty frilly as well, but on the center it had blue comic letters that give you your newly earned title of BABY.

You now stand in front of these 3 mirrors fully suited, you are feeling an alien sense of accomplishment as you fitted yourself in this costume and you examine what an adorable little clown you had become so far, feeling also thankful about the trouble your new friends went through to make sure you are a very detailed caricature, inside and out.

Then it happens, the music stops, the other clowns disappear, and the lights go out.
1111211121.title: Suit up!

11112111211.content:
“Goo goo? Daa daa?” you ask out to the dark. Suddenly, everyone is gone and it all went black. You look around without moving from where you stand, wondering what was going to happen now. You then notice that one mirror remained, it stood out in this darkness in a dark blue tone of color at the borders and plainly showing only your reflection in this darkness. You are standing out in this darkness as well, in a light baby blue color and the whiteness in your bib and your face. You transfix yourself at this reflection for a very prolonged moment, and without warning your mind starts racing with an embarrassment you should’ve had moments ago.

“What the Hell is happening to me?! Why am I doing this?! Why am I dressed like this?! This isn’t me! None of this is right! My face, my body…my body! What have they done to me!?” You are thinking this.

“Baa goo daa daa!? Goo goo baa baa baa!? Boo boo! Boo!” You are saying this. You begin to madly tug away at your bib and bonnet and romper in a fruitless effort to take it all off. It’s not going to happen. And so you tire yourself out, you are pressing both your mittens against the remaining mirror and look straight at it. As you look on, you are seriously embarrassed at what you’ve become, and your cheeks begin to shine a little red. It’s a round comical blush forming itself and settled as a new clown feature you had seemingly just done to yourself. Your eyes roll back and you fall down as you are seemingly about to pass out from all this happening.

The fall was very cushy, you land on what looks like a long bright pink rug and your head was in a very soft white pillow. You look up to your front, everything is still dark except the mirror with your reflection and now these items. Although from where you are lying, you can’t really see your reflection in the mirror. But all of a sudden you hear giggling, and a certain Pierrot clown jumps from out of the mirror. Pollyanna was with you again. And she landed right on top of you.

“Ohho hoh ho ho, this is too much! Just look at you! I could eat you!” she says to you overjoyed, pinching and tickling and pecking your face with kisses. Pinching at your comical new cheeks “Oh I just want to eat these cheeks! You little baby! You’re our little baby now! And that little nose! Oh yes, oh yes..!” and with that she places her mouth in your nose, and she gives it an innocent little gnaw. You then start feeling a little tickling sensation in your nose, which then bursts with a honking sound into a bright red clown nose.

“Heheheh, what do you think of that? You’re definitely one of us. You’re all clown now. Now brace yourself, because these are officially your last seconds as a big boy.” and she drives her head into yours and gives you the biggest kiss of your life. Everything just stops in your mind for what seems like minutes as this goes on and on. You are freaked out beyond belief, you want to get up and leave running, but this clown has you. And you almost start feeling as though you also have her. Whatever comes next, you just hope it’s all with her from here on. You’ve just finally submit yourself, and you were about to feel the consequences for it.

Her lips suddenly press themselves, almost backing away from yours, but you feel her teeth. You also feel something coming out of your mouth. It first feels like plastic inside your mouth, but as you notice that Pollyanna pulls whatever it is out with her teeth from your mouth, with a very goofy look on her face, you then have an explosion of rubber all over your mouth and more plastic just swelling and covering your lips.

Pollyanna has just magically pulled out a huge pacifier out of your mouth, and there it stayed.

“There, full time baby!” she says as she pats your head and gets up. The lights come back on, you find yourself lying on a pink and blue baby carriage, for comedic purposes that fit your size of course, back inside what looked like Chuckle’s Joke Shop. A bright green sheet with little drawings of flowers and hearts covers up to your head and you are tucked in. You try to move your arms and uncover yourself but you can’t. You try to spit out the large pacifier but you can’t. There’s 5 clowns looking straight at you. And they’ve just made you into one of their own.

“Well girls? What do you think?” asked Pollyanna.
“This is the best day ever! We have a little baby to play with!” said Pudding.
“And he looks so funny! Everybody is going to laugh the second they take a look at him!” said Velvet.
“Oh everybody’s just gonna eat him up!” said Cake.
“Oh yeah, you’re gonna be a big star, Baby!” said Rhapsie pointing at you and honking at your new red round nose.
“That’s right! And we’re going to travel the whole wide world! You’re going to be making people laugh in every city in every country!” said Pollyanna
“Well, it’s not like you’re going to see much of it, after all, you’re going to be under the big red top all the time.” explained Velvet.
“Oooh, that’s right! In fact, let’s hope you get a good first impression of the place! You won’t really be leaving it for a long time the minute you step in..!” replied Pollyanna
“And whenever we’re not working, that Mr. Joy is sure going to be busy!” said Rhapsie while giving you a look of mock sensuality.
“Okay, we got what we came here for! Now let’s march away, girls!” said Velvet as she opened the door, there was a big parade outside, the circus had arrived and it came to seemingly pick you up. The clowns leave the store and join the parade to make their way to the giant tent, and before wheeling you away to your new life waiting you there, Pollyanna says this to you:

“Well Baby, this is it. The second we go out, it’s everybody laughing straight at you. And it’s never going to stop. I’m not going to lie to you, it’s constant, it’s going to flood your mind. I’m telling you this because I know you’ve never been a clown before. But I’m sure you’ll get used to it, eventually. Every other guy we’ve picked up got used to it, so much to the point that they all decided to stay clowns! Now you, you’re special, this is a first for us. This is a first for me! We’re going to have so much fun watching grow up again as our little clown baby, and when I decide that you should be big clown again..! Oh shoot, looks like we’re the last clowns in this parade! Oh well, more laughs for us!”

THE END
11112111211.title: Welcome, Baby!

111122.content:
So many things seem wrong with that sentence, but one thought in particular speaks loudest in your mind.
"But I'm not a girl-"

"Not a problem, sweetkins!" says Velvet from behind you, "You boys always have such rough skin, but we know how to get skin soft and smooth, don't we girls?

Apprehensive of the wicked grins surrounding, you slowly ask your captors, "How?"

The five of them cry out in unison, "WHIPPED CREAM!!"
Rhapsie immediately slams a large fluffly cream pie right into your face. The cold, wet cream envelopes you eyes, nose, mouth, and ears. Finding your arms and legs unrestrained, you jump to your feet sputtering. As your feet touch the floor, you realize they are bare. The girls must have taken your shoes and socks while you were seated. When you clear your eyes of cream to look down, you see gloved hands grab ahold of your pant legs as another pair of hands belonging to Pollyana undoes your belt. Not knowing where she's going with this, and not having time to think about it, you stand dumbfounded for a brief second before she places her hands on your chest, brings her face a kiss away from yours, and shoves you backward. As your arms pinwheel furiously, you feel the hands on your pant legs jerk swiftly up and away, taking your pants with them. You exposed backside lands with explosive force on to a large cream cake, placed in the seat of your chair by the clown of the same name. Your shirt is grabbed from behind you and pulled over your head. Blinded, with your arms bound by the shirt, the girls tickle you mercilessly and you feel someone give you a very loud and wet raspberry on your exposed tummy. As you catch your breath after tickle induced giggling fits, your shirt is removed entirely. You see Rhapsie, Velvet, Pollyanna and Cake standing before you.

Believing your treatment complete, you raise the question, "Is that it?"

"Not quite," says Velvet with another wicked grin, "Oh, Pudding?"

The quartet of clowns step aside to reveal their fifth member, Pudding, standing ready with what appears to be a fireman's hose, which is pointed directly at you. With a playful laugh she charges the nozzle, and you are suddenly struck by a heavy stream of frothy, cool cream. Pudding takes her time, and as you writhe and spin in your chair, she covers every inch of you. When she finally cuts off the stream, you find yourself too exhausted to move.

"We'll just let the cream soak for a bit." Velvet tells her cohorts. "His skin will be soft, smooth and creamy white in no time."

Rhapsie, hopping over Pudding in a quick game of leap frog, calls out, "Hey Polly, what kinds of jester girl are we going to make him anyway? A skinny doll like you, or a bouncy ball like Cake?"

Pollyana responds, "Of course, our new jestress will be..."
111122.title: "Our very own Girl Jester!

choices: You're back in the clown car with only Pollyanna.
You're enclosed in a dark space.
1111221.content:
You're falling asleep again from the exhaustion, as you drift off you hear Pollyanna say this: "You guys turned out great and everything, but now I need a sidekick..."

Once again, you wake up...
1111221.title: Pollynna's plan.

choices: My house. You're going to need a place to stay here.
My favorite Salon, only the best for my new sidekick.
11112211.content:
"Where are you taking me?" You groggily say with your eyes still blurred and disorientation still hanging over you. You're so out of it you don't notice that your hands have been tied up with what appears to be balloon handcuffs.

Pollyanna who was currently focused on driving then replied with: "......."
11112211.title: You're back in the clown car with only Poll...

choices: No, both your arms and legs are tied and feel numb.
Yes, you were lying in a fetal position.
11112212.content:
You wake up to darkness and you can't see a thing.

Can you move?
11112212.title: You're enclosed in a dark space.

choices: Feel the place around and try to figure out where you are.
111122122.content: So you're lying up in a fetal position in a dark close space. What do you do realizing this?
111122122.title: What will you do?

1112.content:
...everything is silent for a moment. And then you start hearing a squeaky voice screaming: "Guys, this is it! You know it! I know it! She knows it, but she ain't giving in! But that's cool and that's why we love her! This is it"

"Gelato, no!"

A clown jumps out of the car, this startles you. He seems to be a pretty big figure, and this was more than just in the terms of a human fitting on that toy car, this clown had something of a real athletic physique. He was wearing red overalls but seemed shirtless, was clown white his natural skin color?? He runs up to you with a tiny blue ruler and comically attempts to take your measurements with it. Two other clowns step out of the car, one is enormously obese wearing a blue jumpsuit, the other seemed like an average person wearing a green clown trenchcoat and pants.

"Gelato, I don't think this is a good idea!" - squeaked the fat one.
"I dunno Tubby, I'm kinda starting to feel it like him. If it comes down to this then we should do something fast." - squeaked the other one in a calm cool tone.
"Thank you Cory! Congratulations lady, you messed up! You're one of us now, come on!" - squeaked Gelato right at your befuddled face.
"Alright alright, let's see what we got here." - you hear in the back, it was a woman's voice. Seems like the ring leader of these crazy clowns came along and emerged from the toy Beetle. Her attire was quite classic but at the same time very tight for a circus ring leader. She was a brunette with long hair and wore a black top hat, she also had with her a small whip.

"Gelato and Cory, we're going to have to work with this figure, as it is right now it just won't do..." - she said to her darling clowns while looking straight at still confused you.
"I-I knew that..." - quickly responded Cory.
"Congratulations girl, your dull and uninteresting life has just ended and becomes a bright and funny new life in our amazing little world!" - addresses the ring leader right at you.
"Okay, this is getting creepier and creepier, before you people continue I'd like to know where I am..." - you finally tell them.
"Where you are right now is not important, is where we need you to be as soon as possible." - answered the ring leader.
"What are you talking about? This doesn't make any sense..!" - you tell her. And with a quick snap of her whip to the air, your body suddenly reacts and stands completely still. You feel almost frozen.

"Alright guys, let's go. We got a lot of work to do!" - orders the ring leader, and with that the clowns grab you and take you to their car. Cory seems to be the wheelman, er, clown. Tubby's in the passenger seat and you are in the back with Gelato and the ring leader, who has her arm wrapped around your shoulder and can't stop staring at you smiling. They drive off.

Oh man, the clowns took you to their car?! That's not good, that's supposed to happen! Where are they gonna take you to?!
1112.title: Mmm ladies!

choices: Let's paint the canvas right now!
Let's wait for Gelato to come over!
11122.content:
You don't know how long the ride took but you fell asleep along the way. When you wake up to find yourself alone in the clown car all the doors are open and naturally, you walk out wondering what was happening now. You're still in the same grassy field but you had arrived at a circus now, a very large big red top with all the trailers and animal cages set up in the place and all the performers and handymen keeping themselves busy. You also see a line of spectators and a parking lot and you take a breath of relief thinking you were back in civilization.

From a white trailer near you decorated with lots of drawings of red hearts and a heart shaped door frame comes out the ring leader, smiling, then bursting into laughter when she sees you. "Oh man, you're finally up! Did you sleep well beautiful??"
"Man, what the Hell was that all about!?"
"Nothing nothing, it was just a joke. And if I or any of the clowns offended you in any way then let me be the first to personally apologize and me and the guys will make it up to you just as soon as we're done with this session, okay?" - she explained, you calmed down and you smiled. This was a bizarre experience but not something to lose your head over, also considering how cute this ring leader was.
"Why don't you step into my trailer while you wait? Come on!" - she coaxes, you follow.

You step in, this trailer looked more like an oddball honeymoon suite than the circus management office you were expecting. The surroundings are all white, every accessory and furniture was red, hearts everywhere. A heart shaped bed, heart shaped lamps, heart shaped desks with heart shaped handles, heart shaped construction paper cutouts dangling in strings on the ceiling. And yes hearts all over the wallpaper. You note this and you chuckle, and the ring leader blows red glitter into your face.

It surprises you, but you can't react. It was the same as when she froze you with her whip, you now couldn't move and she stood in front of you grinning, watching your hair fall out, your clothes disappear, and your skin bleach. She then pushes you into the bed, your body may be paralyzed but it's not numb, you feel her blow the glitter into your crotch area and then the horror of no longer feeling your balls and penis. She then sits down and gets in your face and kisses your lips in a comical plunger style devoid of any sensuality. You feel something in your face contorting, emptying out features, and when she pulls out she looks as if she's holding something in her cheeks like a squirrel, she takes it to both your nipples, these explode into breasts.

"Now then..." - she says, pulling out a white and red neck ruffle and fitting it on you. "Who should we get to paint this canvas?? I was thinking Gelato since he's such a goof. But I think I have enough time to finish you up and you make your debut at the end of this session right now! Let's see, let's see..."
11122.title: TG Circus, oh my!

choices: Psst, ring leader actually called down Tubby!
111222.content:
The ring leader closes the door on her way out. Cory and Tubby are sitting around outside watching. They watch as the trailer starts to rock up and down and they hear a collection of noisy sound effects, ranging from sounds of an active construction site to a bunch of honks. This goes on for almost half an hour until the door opens, a bunch of red heart shaped balloons take to the air and then Gelato walks out first and he gently reaches for your puffy white gloved hand.

You finally emerge, transformed and fully dressed. You had hair again, it was green curls shooting perfectly upwards and nothing waving to the sides. In the upper middle there was a small red bow. Your lips had inflated into a fiery red set that looked like it had been treated with heavy doses of collagen, with a red clown nose the size of a tennis ball to complement it. You were still wearing the neck ruffle but now you also had a green with drawings of red and white hearts leotard covering all your body with a ballerina's tutu on the waist and a large red bow in the back. In your new red clownish Mary Janes, Gelato walked you to a large mirror the ring leader held up so that you could gaze at what you had become...
111222.title: Gelato clowns you!

choices: "WHAT HAVE YOU FREAKS DONE TO ME?!"
1112222.content: "Oh hohoho! Gelato, you've outdone yourself!" - says the ring leader holding the mirror up for you. "What do you think, darling? It's the new you!"
1112222.title: Your reaction. ( enclosed )

112.content:
They look like twins of a sort, both bulbous of face and figure. Each has a bright red nose adhering to their face that must be fake, though they seem seamless and there are certainly no visible strings to keep them in place. The expression they wear are painted on in an august clown style with exaggerated eyebrows and rouged cheeks. These particular expressions seem to be conveying a decidedly unpleasant dispostion.

"Oy!" says the one on the left, "didn't your mother teach you-"
"not to go barging into other dimensions uninvited?" finishes the one on the right.
"Excuse me?" you utter with a partly withheld chuckle.
"No excuses! No visitors allowed in this-"
"dimension 'til it's done. And it aint yet."

You gather that these bizarre brothers speak for each other often, as if they shared a brain, and from the look of them, their collective IQ is still a short count. Still, you are grateful for their presence since if they weren't around to distract and amuse you, you'd probably be extremely distraught at the concept of not knowing where you are or how to get back. Before your mind loses its composure, it latches on to what the one on the right just said.

"What do you mean 'dimension?'" you ask with a non-chalance barely concealing the desperate hope that his words will make everything simple and safe.

They reply, "You are intruding in a dimesion that is-"
"still being created. We are the gate keepers,-"
"or at least we will be once we've got a gate."
With a metaphoric fingerhold still tenuously holding on to hope, you ask, "but you've still got a way back to my dimension, like a back door or something, right?"

"Nope, but we should be getting one in tomorrow."
"'Cept our sun hasn't started moving yet, so who knows when that'll be."
"In the meantime, we would like to greet you with-"
"a hearty handshake," which the left one gives you, "and joyful cry of-"
"Welcome to Clown World!" they cry in unison.

You couldn't help but notice the eyebrows that were painted as furrowed briefly rose into an expression of joy and welcome, before quickly returning to angry furrows.

"Only we can't welcome you 'cause the world's not done-"
"and you're not invited anyway."

Amusement gives way to annoyance and you decide to tell these two clown off and demand safe passage home.

With unchecked temper, you shout, "Now, wait just a minute! Listen-
112.title: Two guys in tights approach you

choices: look at yourself in the mirror.
1121.content:
"Hang on! He knows the Tweedle Twins!"
"You've been to Wonderland then?"

Caught off guard by their sudden shift in attitude while you were mid-tirade, you take a moment to admit, "Well, no. I just read about in the book Alice in Wonderland."

"How do you like that?! Seems our gate crasher learned how to crash our on-order transdimensional gate-"
"from another famous transdimensional gate-crasher. He even looks like Alice."
"'Cept she had long blonde hair, like this."

From somewhere behind his back, the one on the right pulls a wig of long blonde curls and forces it firmly on to your head before you can react.

"And she wore that blue dress."

While you attempt to reach up and remove the wig, the one on the left pulls a blue dress from behind his back and pulls it over your head down tight to your waist, where he immediately cinches it very tightly in place with a frilly white pinafore. You struggle to resist, but as your hands are currently pinned next to your neck by the collar of this unexpected dress, you succeed only in falling onto your back and remaining there while the strange men in tights continue to recall that famous lost english girl and dress you to match her.

"She wore those milky white tights and frilly bloomers."
"Don't forget those cute black maryjane shoes she had."
"And she had such a pretty face."

By the time you've freed your hands from your collar and regained their usage by pushing them through the sleeves of the emasculating dress, the strange men have just finished applying your makeup and stand back to admire their handiwork. You blush with furious embarrassment underneath a heavy layer of fair foundation and bright pink blush. Brushing golden curls out of your face you attempt to compose yourself and get to your feet, which you find a difficult task as the maryjanes they have slipped on your feet have a 5 inch heel and 2 inch platform base to them. The two men chuckle at you as you slowly make your way to an unsteady standing position.

"She looks like she could use a little help staying up," says the one on the left with a wicked grin.
"Well, then by all means, let us toss her a line." says the other with a mirroring smirk.

The one on the right shakes the hand of his twin and then pulls a piece of rope with a small card attached to it from his brother's sleeve. He then turns and tosses the rope at you. Reacting quickly you snatch the rop out of the air and as you attempt to toss it down and away from you like a venomous snake, you notice it catches on the air above your head and fails to fall. Stunned by this defiance of gravity, you stare at the rope as its attached card turns to become legible.

The card reads, "Don't Pull"

At that moment, a large square patch of the ground directly beneath your feet drops away on hidden hinges. You have just enough time to turn your startled eyes downward before you fall screaming into the abyss.

After a terrifyingly long second, the skirt of your dress billows out and slows your decent as a parachute would to a slow downward drift. As you feel the air rushing beneath your skirt, you feel uncomfortably exposed and have to stop yourself from crushing your parachute for the sake of modesty. You can hear howls of laughter drifting down the hole at you from the men above.

The floor of the hole gently greets your strange new shoes and breifly struggle to maintain your balance. Looking around the room at the base of the hole, you spy a small door and tall mirror. You take this oppurtunity to...
1121.title: Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum"

choices: cross the grassy hill toward the strange music in the distance.
sit down right where you are and wait for someone to come.
11211.content:
You make it a total of two steps before you trip and fall on your face. You then crawl to the door twist the handle and pull it open. Light streams in from the open door and you feel a sense of triumph at anticipated freedom. There's just one problem; there's no way you are going to fit through that tiny door. You look around desperately for something to help you widen the portal, and notice a small table now bathed in the light from the door.

Upon the table you see a pair of vials of liquid and a pair small cakes. They are each labelled, but rather than the 'drink me' and 'eat me' notes you would expect of this situation, they are marked with other suggestive verbs. You pick up a bottle labeled 'sniff me' and consider it. You know you need to shrink to get out, and with a quick mustering of courage, you uncork the vial and inhale.

Immediately you feel it affecting you and toss the bottle away into the dark lest its pervading odor shrink you too much. You feel the once tight dress loosen a bit around, and then nothing. A quick self examination tells you that although you are now about 8 inches shorter, you are still too big to get through the door. You look to recover the 'sniff me' vial, but it appears to have dissappeared entirely, so you return to the tray. You pick up the other bottle and read its label. 'Gargle me' is a phrase you'd never thought you'd read before, but you pop the cork and oblige.

You gargle for a good half minute before you start to feel anything, and when the tingling starts this time, you feel it localized to your nether-regions. In shock, you swallow a bit of the gargled fluid, then spray the rest across the room in a spit-take that should have been legendary. You collapse to the floor in horror as you feel your manhood shrink back into yourself. With feverish action you clutch the first cake you can reach from the table and wolf it down in two bites hoping it will undo the work of the last item.

As was the case with the last drink, the cake has a localized effect, but the growth is in an entirely different area. You find that you now have a pair of quite lovely breasts. On the verge of frustrated tears you look at the last pastry. It is labeled 'throw me.' You slump down, slip off the problematic shoes, now two sizes too small, and sigh, and wimper.

You consider the cake for a moment, pick it up slowly, and then hurl it with all your strength at the small door. The small cake strikes the small door, the small door slams shut, and the wall around it falls away with a great crash. As the dust clears, you can see a great gaping hole to the outside before you.

Free now, but feeling less than triumphant, you pick up your shoes and walk out into the sunlight. Surveying your options, you decide to...
11211.title: rush to the door.

112111.content:
As you crest the hill, you look down to see the flashing lights of what appears to be both a circus and a carnival. From the carnival side, you hear the ding of bells, the blare of whistles and sirens, and the splash of water. Men in dusty overalls are busy erecting booths and carrying balls, bottles, and stuffed animals in to place in them.

Beside this flurry of carnival action stands a great colorful tent, from inside of which you hear random bursts of raucous laughter that seem to indicate a nearly full house as an audience to what must be a hilarious show.

You hike up your skirts and march towards
112111.title: cross the grassy hill toward the strange music ...

choices: poke your face through the hole.
1121111.content:
Wishing to avoid any unnecessary exposure in your fool-applied feminine attire, you sneak around the back side of the newly erected booths. Since your body has been altered by what you can only assumed to be magic, you reason that a carnival magician and fortune telling gypsy would be your best hope of finding a way to turn back to normal. Stealthily creeping behind the booths, you prick your ears for some indication that such a person might be near. You hear workers busy setting up booths on the far side of the carnival thoroughfare, and carnies calling out to prospective customers just on the other side of immediate booths. There's a fluxuating cacophony of falling milk bottles, popping balloons, and merchandising vendors seeping through the walls.

Then, you hear a distinct voice rise briefly above the others to proclaim, "Learn your fortune! Enchant your future! Rid yourself of curses! Madame Magia, mistress of the arcane, sees all, inspires all, and cures all!"

You would have laughed at such a claim a day ago, but in this place you are ready to believe. All you need to do now is get to her. You know her tent or shack must be nearby, but the booths you hide behind obscures your view of the man advertising for her. You need to get a good look without exposing yourself to the crowd on the other side. There appear to be two likely vantage points.

Just to your left, there is a oval shaped hole big enough for your face where you could observe without displaying your dress. To your right, a wooden stairwell leads to a small door to an area above the booths where you might be able to see everything from above the crowd's eye level.

You opt to
1121111.title: the carnival.

choices: go wash up and change clothing.
11211111.content:
As you stick your face into the hole you lean your weight against the wall. In so doing, you accidentally dislodge the heavy tarp above the wall, which rolls down over your back to thump on the ground by your feet. You attempt you push yourself back from the wall, but the weight of the tarp has you pinned in place. You can't even move your arms, which (like the rest of you) are held tight against the wall by the heavy, immovable canvas. Your struggling draws the attention of a carny on the crowds side of the wall, to which your face is exposed.

"Oh, hello. You're new, and you're early too, hadn't even got the tins ready til just now. Nice makeup, *chuckle* I can see you're ready to give 'em a worthy target."

The man seems to have mistaken you for an employee here. Embarrassment stains your cheeks as you remember how they are already stained with heavy blush courtesy of those tweedle resemblent gateless guardians.

You are about to clear the matter up with the carny and ask him to help free you, when he turns around and calls loudly to the milling crowd, "Pie toss! Show this lovely lady you are a master of Clown World's most revered skill. Pick up a pie, and put it to good use. Don't miss your chance to fling flan at her face, to pitch a pastry at her puss, to cast cream over her countenance!"

The entirety of your predicament dawns on you as the carny is in mid-speech, you look down and see that this side of the wall has been painted with dancing clowns, and your face is in the place of the clown's at the center of the picture. As if you didn't feel rediculous enough, you are now the bullseye in a humiliating pie throwing booth. A bright light shines on your face to illuminate the patrons' target, and its intensity makes it impossible to distinguish individuals in the now gathering crowd. You open your mouth to object that aren't supposed to be here, just as a pie slams hard against the wall roughly a foot away from your face. You shriek at the suddeness of it and a dollop of whipped cream bounces off your cheek leave a little white smudge. The crowd laughs briefly at you reaction, and someone remarks that someone else "couldn't hit the broad side of a circus tent."

You manage to emit the words, "Excuse me." to the faceless crowd as another pie sails over head to splatter high on the wall. A small glob of whipped cream drops down and attaches itself to your nose, gaining another brief chortle from your audience. You blow furiously at your nose in an attempt to discard the cream as another pie dashes on the ground in front of you. The patronizing "awww" from the crowd confirms that the most recent tosser was a small child. As you are craning your neck to see if the pie that is plastered above you has the potential to slip down into your hair, you hear your prospective assailants go silent.

Nervous at the change, you endeavour to ask what's going on. You get as far as "Wha-," when suddenly you feel the cold impact of wet cream, and sight and hearing become muffled by a fluffy white coating. You spit out a mouthful of the pie as the crowd erupts in explosive cheers and guffaws. With your arms still pinned, the best you can do is shake your head and bat you eyes furiously to clear your vision. Just when you start worrying that you'll be unable to clean your face properly and suffocate should another tosser aim true, you are rewarded with a cleansing stream of cold seltzer water from the carny running the booth. You sputter in indignation, and receive renewed raucous ridicule from the rabble.

Your demeaning distress continues for another twenty or so minutes before the carny at the booth announces that he must close for a shift change. When he comes over to you to compliment you on your comic reactions, you explain how you've become trapped and require assistance. Within a few moments effort, you are freed of the fallen tarp and as the carny leers over your altered anatomy, you are able to ask him some questions.

You ask where you can
11211111.title: poke your face through the hole.

choices: You slip into the audience to find a seat.
1121112.content:
You continue to hear peals of laughter emit from the tent, and though you are feeling more self-conscious about your feminine appearance, you hold on to the hope that someone inside will know how to get you back home, and possibly change you back into your former figure as well. Smoothing back ragged blonde curls from your face and brushing dust from your pinafore, you muster your courage and step inside the tent.

With your eyes to the bright cartoonish sun, the audience seated on either side of the entrance appear to be made entirely of moving shadows. You can hear individual voices and laughs, but see no faces. In the great ring ahead of you, clowns prance about and wield various props as they energetically enact practiced skits or slapstick pranks with each other.

The ring is well lit and you consider marching right into the center of it and confronting the assembled masses with your desperate plea. Another part of you would just as soon turn around and run away from these clowns before they force some fresh humiliation upon you, so you consider slipping into the audience and watching the show for a bit to determine if these clowns are anything at all like the two that left you in your current state.
1121112.title: the circus tent.

1122.content:
"Oh?!"
"Magpies are we?!"
"Well you sir, are a!..."
1122.title: "Heckle and Jeckle"

11223.content: One of them facepalms in indignation. "Oh brother of mine can't you see?!..."
11223.title: "Cigarette! Er, I mean..."

112231.content:
Suddenly, you notice right next to you a petit blond in excersice clothes looking at them as puzzled as you, and right next to her this other black haired guy wearing a jacket with a white tanktop underneath and sunglasses. "Hey who you calling a clown?!" - he yells at them angrily and turns to finally notice you two and reacts with a jump scare. That's when a fourth guy shows up, bald guy with a pony tail dressed like a grunger, bumps into him from behind reaching the girl and you falling down!
"Well!..."
"That's just about all of them!..." - Heckle & Jeckle started talking again.
"Now then!..."
112231.title: "Somebody finally sent in the clowns!"

choices: You join the parade... as a clown.
You join the parade... as an elephant
You join the parade... as the guy who cleans up after the elephants
113.content:
You were slightly rattled as you heard loud, earth-quaking footsteps, accompanied by the unmistakable trumpeting of an elephant. In fact, as you observed, it was a whole parade of elephants marching along in the distance along the horizon. You weren’t quite sure why they were there; this field didn’t look like a savannah. But the unusual sight piqued your curiosity. Besides, it’s not like there were any other places to go, that you could see anyway.

You hurried up to the elephant parade, hoping there was somebody there who could help. Only upon getting closer did you see that the strange sight was accompanied by even stranger elephants. They looked somewhat cartoonish, with dopey grins and wide eyes. They were all seemingly painted bright pink, and oddly enough dressed up like clowns almost, with painted faces. They cheerfully marched behind each other, trumpeting loudly. The ground near them shook, and you were briefly worried they’d flatten you if you startled them. Your fears of not finding another person were alleviated somewhat though, as you saw several clowns around the elephants too. You guessed the circus must be in town, or something. Bulky men, either fat or muscular, rode around on unicycles or on top of the elephants themselves, or simply bounced or marched in formation with them. They had a wide array of colorful hair, clothing, and faces, but all seemed to be having a good time. You supposed they would, being clowns and all.

The second thing you noticed was the smell, and you wrinkled your nose in disgust. How could they smell so bad? Then you heard the glorious passing of gas from a few elephants in the group, and noticed the trail of dun some had left behind them, and rolled your eyes. Great, farting clown elephants, could this day get any weirder? Still, It was your best bet of finding anybody to talk to. Hopefully one of these clowns could stop fooling around and give you directions.

Approaching them, despite the smell assaulting your nose, you waved your arms and yelled, “Um, excuse me? A little help here?” You looked through the crowd, before seeing one particular clown, sitting on the elephant in front, gazing at you, grinning like the others. He stood up, tapped the elephant’s head with his big feet, and jumped as you watched in disbelief. He landed on the elephant’s trunk, which curled as he slid down, before flying through the air and somersaulting, landing right at your feet as he bowed with a flourish. Impressive, you thought, before the clown looked at you.

He was rather hefty, yet surprisingly nimble for his size. He looked about middle-aged you thought, with his flabby gut. He wore a tattered suit, patched with all sorts of textiles, and a top-hat with a partly torn lid that he tipped to you, exposing a bald spot on his head surrounded by curly rainbow hair. Large, ruby-red shoes covered his feet, and his hands similarly were covered in white gloves with exposed fingertips. His bright red lips and blue-colored eyes smiled warmly at you. “Howdy, son,” He said affectionately, “What can I do fer’ ya?” He reached up, grabbing his bulbous, bright red nose, which he honked twice.

You stared at him, mouth agape, still a bit surprised by the acrobatics act he had just done. He watched you, chuckling, “You could catch flies with that mouth boy.”. It quickly brought you back to your senses and you shut it, before speaking, “Uh…. Who are you?” The fat clown laughed, snapping his suspenders, “Name’s Curly, Curly the Clown. Curles to my friends though.” He gestured to the parade, “And this is my troupe. Were supposed to be performin’ at the Big Top over in Clown Town today. It’s our 300th tour to date!” He chuckled. “Your… 300th tour?” You said, a bit in disbelief. “Well, I’ve been a clown a long time boyo.”, “How long?” you asked. He smiled, “Well, just about all my life I reckon! Been one since my Daddy was in polka-dotted diapers!” He laughed, “…Course he’s always worn polka-dotted diapers, even now!” He laughed again as you stared, a bit weirded out.

Curly suddenly stuck out his hand to you, to your surprise, “I take it yer’ not from around these parts. Well, it’d be rude not to show some hospitality. Put it there, pally.” You regarded the outstretched hand hesitantly, and nervously grabbed it. Suddenly there was a buzzing shock to your palm that made you jump and recoil as Curles laughed, “Joy buzzer, oldest trick in the book!” He said, pressing the button and zapping himself to demonstrating, gigging like a lunatic. “Uh, great…” You said, a bit exasperated. Suddenly the clowny ringmaster grabbed you and shoved you under his arm, in something of a headlock. “Aw, don’t feel bad son, we all fall for that every once in a while…” He chuckled as you gagged. You were so close to his armpit, you could smell his positively nauseating B.O.. When was the last time this guy had a bath? “Just be glad I didn’t ask ya to pull my finger. Oof, I could use that. My gut’s been so full a’ gas lately.” He lifted his leg, ripping a loud fart and stinking up the place even worse. You thought you were going to be sick as he just giggled childishly, patting his rotund stomach, “Ah, that’s better.” He sighed in relief.

“Can I just, ugh, get some directions please?” You asked, trying not to be choked by stink, or the headlock he was holding you in, “Where is here anyway?”, “Why this is Clown World, son! Got elephant turds fer’ brains, boy?” You were pretty sure you had more ‘brains’ than this guy had, by a large margin. Still, you didn’t want to be too rude. So, was this supposed to be some alternate dimension or something. “Uhh, well, that’s great and all Mr. Curly--”, “Please, call me Curles. Mr. Curly was my Daddy’s name. Course, he’s never been able to spell it.” He interrupted, “Ohhh-kayyy…. Uh, Mr. Curles, is there any way out of Clown World?” He looked at you in surprise, “Now why would ya ever wanna leave? This place is great!”, “Maybe for you, but I gotta get home.” You weakly replied. Curles tapped his chin in thought, still keeping you trapped under his stinking armpit, “Well, maybe somebody in the city could help ya out then. I got a few friends who might.”, “Great, well, could you point me towards---“, “I got a better idea!” He smiled, interrupting again as he finally freed you from huffing any more of his stinky musk. “Howsabout you go with us?”

“Uhh, I think I can make it on my own…” You said, but Curles wasn’t listening. “I insist. You could even travel in a parade with us!” He laughed. “You ever been in a parade, boy?”, “Er, no, I guess not.” You confessed, “Might be fun. C’mon, wanna give it a try? You might have some fun!” You grimaced. Admittedly, it did sound kinda fun… Despite the smell that is. And if you were going to the same location, you guess it wouldn’t matter. “Uhh, fine I guess.” Curles suddenly pulled you into a headlock, dragging you back into his stink, before walking you over to the marching elephants, which smelled even worse up close! “Great! It’s settled. Yanno, we’re actually a little shorthanded, but I could always use some extra help!” He chuckled, “Don’t worry though, it’ll be easy.” He released you, leaving you gasping for air again as he laughed, “Ugh, fine, what do you want me to do?” You asked.

He scratched his chin in thought. “Hmm… Well, I’m sure I can find something. But first, some changes are in order.” He snapped his fingers. Suddenly you felt a tingle in your body, which spread, turning into a tickle. You uncontrollably grinned, suddenly giggling as you felt your body change. “Hope ya like being in the parade, boy!” Curles chuckled
113.title: An Elephant Parade Passes By

115.content:
You start hearing a squeaky sound. Very small and distant at first, but it grows louder and louder. As it does, you turn and turn a little frantically trying to find the source of it, it's a bit of a scary feeling in such a vast and empty field not knowing where a sound could be coming from. And just when it grew it's nearest you, you hear somebody humming a song. And then finally you are bumped off your feet by a humongous singing creature.

" ♪ Everybody Wang Chung tonight! ♫" - it sang.

As you get back up, you take a look at what hit you. It was a clown. A huge clown. And it was jogging. He had silly looking red sneakers and dark blue fluffy headphones with an antenna sticking out and huge red boxing gloves for the occasion. His suit was light blue and he wore a snowcap of the same color covering his bald head. And just as he was going to continue to be on his way, he suddenly stops and takes the headphones off. It was as if he had realized he had hit you, and he turns around slowly to see. He had a shocked look on his face his fat red nose couldn't hide and ran back at you to see if you were alright. This all included frantic squeaking from his sneakers and you taking a look at a gray drawing of 1-ton weigh covering the front of his suit, but this one said '24/7 Tons'.

"Oh boy! Oh boy! Are you alright?!" - the clown asked panicking in a goofy voice.
"Y-yeah, I'm fine." - you answer.
"I didn't hurt you did I?! Oh boy! I'm so so so so so sorry! I didn't see you there! I didn't see you there!" - he kept saying.
"I'm fine, really. I didn't see you either. It was an accident and you didn't hurt me. Um look, where am I? What is this place?" - you try to change the subject.
"Oh boy! Oh boy! How did you get here??" - asked the clown.
"The Joke Shop. One minute I'm in my neighborhood and I notice this place and went in. Next minute, I'm here." - you answer, hoping it gives the clown an idea of what's happening.
"Joke Shop!? Oooooh boy, not good! You shouldnt've gone in! Now you're gonna have a hard time getting back home if you came through the Joke Shop!" - the clown replied.
"Why? What is this place? Where am I?" - you keep on asking.
"Clown World!" - was the ever obvious answer.
"Clown World?" - you say in return - "Well, how do I get out?"
"Not if you stay here in this field!" - tells you the clown - "Look, I was just going to see some buddies of mine, I think they might be able to help you out! They might know more than I do at least, I don't know much about leaving this place since I sort of belong here. Come with me, I'll let you meet them!" - he then invited you.
"Okay, that's cool..." - you agree and then finally ask - "What's your name?"
"24/7 Tons!" - the clown introduces himself happily smiling - "Or at least that's what everyone and everything calls me, so I figure that might be it! Nice to meet you!"

You smile back and you nod, replying back with your name. And you are both on you're way out if this field. You're in Clown World and you've just made a friend.

A new adventure begins!

Where will it go next??
115.title: Hey, watch where you're going!

1153.content:
After what seemed like less than 10 minutes of you and 24/7 Tons making your way through this field, the scenery becomes a bit more varied as you both go up a a very green hill and reach a more verdant area with smiling trees and bushes with colorful heart-shaped flowers all around. But suddenly, you hear some squeaking again, 'Tons hears it too and he then stops.

"Is that one of your friends?" - you ask, figuring a clown was on its way after your initial encounter with Tons.

He doesn't answer but he's looking around, trying to make out who or what was on his way. He stops looking at the back of your direction and panics!

"Oh no! Oh no! Oh no!" - he goes.
"What!? What is it!?" - you ask him feeling as scared as him.
"Hide! Hide! Quick, hide here! Hide!" - the big clown then grabs a hold of you and puts you inside the nearest bush. - "Shh! Stay quiet!"

"Ah great, now this. And just who are you talking to, fatboy?" - you hear at a distance from your hidden position.
"What the- oh hi Aurora! Did you say something?? I was just doing some jogging while listening to classic hits from the-!" - answered 24/7 Tons nervously.
"Oh good grief, shut up! Just shut up! Why did I even ask?! And pro-tip: don't try to hide anything from me if you can't even hide that fat...-" - you keep hearing, the squeaking got closer along with the voice, you made out that it was...a female voice? Out of nowhere, a soft white gloved hand grabbed hold of your head and pulled you up. You see a lady clown witch in front of you, and you both have a pretty shocked look on your faces, but - "...ass." she manages to finish.

You take a good look at this new whiteface clown that made the scene up and down, it was a woman alright, wearing a purple witch's robe and hat with big floppy clown shoes of the same color and red & stripes tights. She had short blond hair, the standard red nose and lipstick on her lower lip with a little blush. Her eyes were neatly lashed and as you noticed that one feature, her look of surprise changed to one that seemed more pleased. Her hand then reached for one of your ears and pulled out a red flower and took a little sniff while looking at you blinking rapidly.

"Well helloooooooo!" - she greeted you.
"Uh, hey..." - you responded, nervously.
"And what are you doing here?" - she asks you in a very friendly manner.
"I came here through the Joke Shop, I'm trying to get back to my home." - you explain, still nervous.
"Oh, the Joke Shop. You poor poor sap, curiosity just got the best of another little kitty..." - she says to you as she passes her gloved hand around your face and starts petting your head - "So you're lost now, where was the fatboy here taking you to?"
"I was taking him to Cory The Clown! He once saw the outside and he might be able to help him! Not you, you're a wicked crazy witch and a bully! Come on, let's get away from her!" - 24/7 Tons interrupts and coaxes you to just leave quickly.
"Uh huh, and you believe that?" - replied Aurora - "You'll have to excuse the fatboy over here my friend! He's a little bit impressionable and reactionary and the other clowns always take advantage of that and can convince him that unicorns are soul sucking creatures capable of godless carnage when provoked!" - she addresses this to you.
"WHAT?!" - you ask in return, that made no sense at all.
"Oh come on, just look at him! How long have you been hanging around him? Tons here, he's something of a buttmonkey! He's the clown that other clowns will be laughing at!" - she explains.
"Okay, without the buttmonkey remark that makes a little sense, but he has been trying to help me. And you're a witch and he called you a bully, so how do I know you're not trying to trick me and give me the same crap you're giving him?" - don't know how but you got your confidence back.
"Me?? Well for starters, you've said it, I'm a witch! I know magic and I use it to get around well, and THAT can help you!" - Aurora then proceeded to place her arm on your shoulders as she kept talking to you - "And yes handsome, I'm also a bully! But, I only bully the other clowns around here. Now you don't look like a clown, you look like about a 9 and a half and that is very rare for all my days around here. I need more of this, please let me help you out!" - she asks you this very nicely and with a very inviting look.
"Don't listen to her!" - interrupts again Tons - "What you said was right, she's only gonna trick you and make it hard for you to leave this place!"
"Well, you have to understand Tons, I really do need all the help I can get." - you explain to the big clown, thinking he really might be the butt of the joke of this world and he might not really help that much - "Okay, how does this magic of yours work?" - you ask Aurora.

She smiles, snaps her fingers and suddenly a purple smokes appears and absorbs all 3 of you. It quickly drifts up into the air and teleports you all somewhere...

Where will it go next??
1153.title: Another clown joins the trip!

11531.content:
The purple smoke clears, you find yourself in the witch's lair. It looks like you're in a scary dungeon..! As scary as you could find them on Sesame Street or if it got refurbished by Sid & Marty Krofft! You aren't scared, this is pretty much what you were expecting. Tons on the other hand is shaking and fumbling towards the nearest door he can find. He struggles but can't get it to open and he comically falls down. You chuckle, this was a pretty funny act these clowns were doing. You then turn your attention to Aurora.

"Alright let's see..." - she begins moving away searching for something on a nearby creaky witch's desk. She pulls out a book and opens it - "So you came from the store? That's a bit of a raw deal for you, you'd have to look all over the place for a way back to were you came, and Clown World is just huge! But I got something here that might make the whole thing easier! In this book there's something I like to call a Precision Spell, and what it does is it'll enable you to teleport to anywhere you need, as long as you ask for it with great precision in your mind and your heart!"
"Wow! That's great! How do I get it to work?" - you ask, you feel very relieved, now you can finally go back home and leave this crazy cartoonish place with its clowns and-
"Ari ari ari ari ari, mudah mudah mudah mudah mudah, cobralalalala, ari ari ari, arrivederci!" - Aurora has snapped and cast the spell! She smiles at you and slams the book shut and suddenly, everything disappears! The last thing you hear is a fading - "Oh noooo..!" from Tons.

You come to...something doesn't feel right...where are you now??
11531.title: Thanks for dropping your guard!

choices: She stops talking and finally just kisses you!
115311.content:
The cracking of a fireplace slowly wakes you up. You feel nothing but softness underneath you but a little breeze on your chest area. You realize you are wearing nothing but your underwear and you bolt to your senses fully awake, you are in a huge soft white bed for a checkered bedroom with a fireplace. Aurora is lying in front of it on a purple rug wearing another set of clothes that looked distinctly...normal. White socks and long light blue jeans, a long sleeved purple shirt. There was a bottle of wine inside a wicker basket next to her and she drank some of it in a crystal glass. Her face seem plain, in comparison to when you first met her, and in her other hand she held a small piece of paper, she looked at with something of a bored yet nostalgic face.

"Sorry..." - she says to you without looking. "Once you go through what I went through you get these...urges."
"...I don't wanna go through what you went through." - you say, feeling suddenly real worried.
"Well good for you, sexy boy..." - she snaps putting the paper down and looking right at you. "You wanna know what it's like to get turned into this?" - she gestures to her body with both her arms. "It's not cool, it's embarrassing as it is scary and it's something I've come to not wish on my worst enemy."

She grabs the basket and stands up walking up to you. Once up to you she shows you the paper she was looking at, it was a small picture of a white woman with short blond hair wearing a blue long sleeved buttoned shirt. She sits next to you and points at it. "Before..." - and then points at herself. "...after."
"Jesus Christ..."
"Yeah and you don't know the half of it, never go inside their cars...but anyway, let's get back to you, now that you know what happens to people here, do you know just how coveted a plain guy like you is? No joke, all the girls locked and transformed here with me HATE the guys here..." - she reaches out for another glass of wine and starts filling it up. "So you have to excuse my behavior, I mean not only do you get a new instinct to act like Saturday morning cartoon character, but again, urges. A plain guy like you is simply irresistible and we have this need to make the most of it before they become just another annoying goofball."
