"It's-it's okay, look, is there a way out of here?" - you say as she hands you the glass and you accept without noticing as you are entranced by her. She slowly moves her head toward yours and you look at each other intently for a long moment, she then closes her eyes and gives you an Eskimo kiss with her red nose and turns back. "No..." - she plainly answers with an uninterested look away from yours sipping on some wine. You feel a bit shocked but still smitten by her presence.
"But don't worry, you stay here and I'll make sure you stay as normal and sexy as you are right now. And I'll look into it. Who knows, maybe there's a way out without you getting turned into anything..." - she turns at you again and smiles.

She then reaches for your crotch and sensually waves her body back to yours as she rubs it around, you're still too shocked to do anything about it. "You know, you're gonna like it here. I've seen how we girls can please you normies good up to before you get careless and clowned. This might be a paradise for you, I mean just think: just you, and little old me as your very own very personal clown. Making you laugh every day, acting stupid just for you, and doing things I am positively sure your girlfriend could never accomplish in bed..."
"A-a-are you trying to cast another spell on me?!" - you sadly reply, scared stiff.
"Oh you mean the witch thing? Yeah it's part of the new me so don't worry about that, I'm actually as adorable and goofy as the rest of them and..."
115311.title: Private time.

1153112.content:
Aurora notices something away from you and quickly reacts. "Oh crap! Get up, I gotta warp you outta here agai-!"- and you hear glass break behind you, you turn to look and there's a huge plunger on your chest and you are pulled to the outside of the building and into the arms of another clown sitting on what looked like an old fashioned window cleaning bench. You look at each other for a moment before anything else happens, she's another female. She's dressed in a shimmering white fairy godmother outfit with purple polka dots. A long skirt that covered all her legs (though you note she's wearing fancy high heeled boots), bubbly shoulders, large fake butterfly wings, and a pointy princess hat with soft purple sheets swinging at the tip. Her hair was also purple and bouncy long, she had something of an elongated adult face behind her big red nose and as you looked at her with your ongoing amazement, the expression on her bleached face seemed like genuine concern. "Are you alright?!" - she asked.
"Uh, no! What is this I don't even-!" - your confused answer, you hear a lot of crushing sounds on the room you just left but before you can just look to see what happened to Aurora. "Yes! Yes, I know, don't worry! I've got you, now hold on!" - and she starts to pull the bench down. You both safely land and you see hordes of clowns in those cartoon cop costumes rush to what looked like the smiling yet evil fortress you just got pulled out of. You are running as you do this, where to you have no idea, but you are being guided by the fairy clown as she holds your hand and has her shiny star tipped wand on the other, she still has a very concerned look on her face. It's nighttime and you both head into a forest, at first you thought that would only make things darker for you, until you both reach an unbelievably bright grove with more cartoonish and smiling trimmings, including a small waterfall and what looked like living stuffed animals roaming about. "There..." - the clown takes a deep breath of relief. "I think here's good spot.
"And who are you now?" - you ask her.
"My name is Rasputina, The Clown." - she answers smiling.
"I...I think I should thank you, Aurora was bent on keeping me as her pet..."
"And you did good staying at her last hideout! Usually it's hard for us to track a place of hers like that. But lucky for you, I can detect whenever a normal person ventures into Clown World!"
"Okay, that's great! Now tell me, how can I leave?"

Her smile drops, she looks away in sudden dismay and walks deeper into the grove. "Okay..." - you answer to that worried again. "At least you're not tricking me like everyone else has been doing."
"Why would you want to leave?" - she asks crossing her arms.
"Well, it's not my world."
"Then why did you enter it?"
"I was trapped in here after I entered Chuckle's Joke Shop, it just suddenly appeared in my town and I was real curious to see what it was..."
"Oh, that..."- she chuckles a bit then turns around to face you again. "So then tell me, if it had been anything else other than a Joke Shop, would you still enter it to see what it was all about?"
"Uh...what?"
"Why would you wanna go into a joke shop for in the first place?"
"Well...it was just there, I mean one morning the lot is empty and then..."
"Really? So you were just weirded out and that's it?"

Suddenly your body froze, you panic as she approaches you. She grabs both your hands and looks at you with a lightly sad smile on her face. "You're here for a reason." - she drops your hands and circles your body slowly in examination, shaking her head in disapproval. "No, no, no. This is just plain terrible. Would you like to know why you walked into of all things a joke shop? Because this isn't you. This wasn't meant to be you!" - she then starts waving her wand slowly, dropping bits of that fairy dust into your body, it shines in reaction and before everything fades out in the brightness you catch a glimpse of her mischievous smile.

"You went to a joke shop because you understand this isn't you, and you don't care for it anymore. You don't care anymore for the things you thought you used to like. You don't care anymore to answer to the same people you would answer to every day. You don't even care about that girlfriend of yours anymore...although, if you bring her to me here, I'll be happy to fix her just like I've fixed you!"

You slowly wake up after a long sleep...
1153112.title: 5000 about freaking time!

11531121.content:
There's a red orb in your face and you bolt sitting up realizing the worst instantly: you had finally been clowned. You reach your new nose to honk it worryingly and even though you were also expecting it, you see your arm has been bleached to a smooth snow white. Both your hands are the same and you start feeling up your body, before you turn your head down to see the rest of your transformed self, your hands stumble upon a baggy fabric wrapped right around your lower body.

This is how your new life as a clown was beginning, you're all alone in the woods wearing nothing but a huge pinned up diaper. "G-g-g-ghh!..." - you felt crushed and embarrassed beyond belief. From here on out everything was going to be more demeaning, you could already picture a lifetime of people laughing at your expense in more comical situations, you were finally their clown! But you did not want this life and you burst into tears! "Ghuaaaa! Ghuaaa! I want my mommy! Where's my mommy!? Ghuaaa!" - words were coming out of your mouth, you were too busy shrieking stupidly to realize what they had been. You couldn't stop crying and as you kept going, the burst of tears coming from your eyes kept getting heavier and heavier, you snap out of it for a moment realizing you had gone off like a fire hydrant! You stop and you look around you, you had soaked the surrounding grassy area to the effect that tiny patches of bright flowers started to grow instantly! They reach up and you are engulfed in a bed of them, then suddenly to your right, a large green figure emerged, it looks down on you and you see the purple petals of a flower open up to reveal a bleached young woman's face. The same happens to your left and right in front of you and there they stood for a moment: 3 women in green skintight bodysuits, large purple flower petals covered their brightly pantomime faces. They look at you with curiosity as the two to your sides descend daintily while the one up front just bends in the same manner. They examine you for a moment and notice your tears. "Awww!" - they all whimper in unison.
"Little baby, why are you crying??" - the one to your right asks in a tender tone as she begins to caress your face and wipe those tears, the other one then held you and started to rock your upper body, the one that stood backed away for a moment in search of something.
"Y-yeah, please! I don't want to be a clown! I don't want to be a clown, no!" - you weep on them.
"Quick flowers, bring the baby over here!" - their friend had pulled up a large blue feeding chair, the other two help you to your feet and walk you up to it, just inches before you reach it however you struggle and try to panic away. "Oh no you don't!" - you hear, and the trio forces you to your seat with a group effort. They strap the arms between the table to hold you down, while one of them ducks to restrain your feet, another one ties up a large bib on your neck as the third one comes up to you with a small crystal jar full of green mush. Almost instantly after you see it, she drives a large plastic blue spoon full of it into your mouth! She turns the handle of the jammed item in all directions as to make sure the mushy spinach is all over your mouth! Surprisingly, you finally snap and get angry, you shake your head to take the spoon out and scream. "Stop tha-!" - and the other flower jammed her own spoonful interrupting you! You spit out her offering. "Why are you doi-!?" - and the third one rises up with hers! The three giggle and with bright smiles they keep humiliatingly feeding you in this dun act!
"Open wide, baby boy!"
"Make sure to eat all of your nummy num-nums!"
"Isn't this just yummy??"
"Awww, your mommy's gonna be so happy when we tell her you've already been fed!"
"W-wait!..." - you now want to ask but keep getting silenced. "Where is she righ-?!"
"She's with Rasputina right now! Then when she's ready she's gonna take you home where you'll be mommy and baby forever and ever!" - then one of them gets in your face, her smiling expression changes to a smirk. "Wish you were someone I used to hate back when I was normal..."
11531121.title: Open wide!

choices: And another clown decides to play with you!
115311211.content: Much to her surprise, you manage to snap free with sheer strenght from your straps! They back off startled as you lift the table away and steady yourself on your feet as quickly as you can, and burst away in your diaper and bib! You can hear them mockingly laughing it off instead of giving chase, so that's good. But as they say, you're not out of the woods yet!
115311211.title: Sheer strenght!

1153112111.content: Both plastic looking things just framed there in the middle of this thrice forsaken clown habitat! One is pink and one is blue! Okay you wandering goon, which portal will it be??
1153112111.title: 2 doors, actually!

11531121111.content: True men choose pink, but where did this portal lead you to??
11531121111.title: Go pink!

choices: You don't know, you just got a pie in the face as you walked in.
11531121112.content: So you go through the blue door, where did this portal you to??
11531121112.title: Feeble blue minds!

choices: Then the clown car comes to pick you both up!
You both head back to the joke shop !
115311211121.content:
Holy diver, what a bizarre nightmare! But hey blog about it later if you can remember it. Right now you and your girlfriend, lying there holding you still asleep, need to get up and get ready for your big day. She takes the lead on the showers and you head to the kitchen to fix up breakfast. You do what you usually do when you brew coffee and drink milk out of the jug, and that's when the num-nums you had last night kicked in and do a number on your diaper!

You shiver realizing that the nightmare is not over. Of course, it all still feels so real. So horribly, horribly real. As real as your girlfriend casually walking in on her bathrobe. Her skin is bleached snow white from the shower with 2 round cartoon red cheeks on her face and her hair grown as far as her back and a jet black coloration you don't remember her ever having. She picks up where you left off with the coffee and stares at you in diapers with a smile. "Baby, why don't you let me handle breakfast today?" - she...squeaks. "You should hurry up and clean off now, we have a huge day ahead of us!" - and blinks rapidly. You...oblige and make your way to the shower, she's right gotta hurry it up. Down the hall you can hear her sing. "Going baby! ~♪ Going baby! ~♪ No more cussing! No more texting! ~♪ Here's your bottle! Wear your bonnet! No no girlfriend! You're going baby! ~♪"

You throw the used up diaper away and the water in the shower bleaches your skin again! And as you dry up, at the first glance of the mirror as the steam wipes off you discover that you're bald! Still scared but you don't scream, you go and get dressed. You only find diapers in the drawers for the whites and clownish over-sized baby clothing in your closet! "Okay look..." - your girl walks back in to get herself dressed "...you haven't been 'pacied' yet, so I'm not under the obligation to just diaper you. Besides, nobody's looking! It wouldn't be funny! Privately it would be kinky, but you're going to be a baby and that stuff's not for you anymore! So yeah, you're gonna have to pin it on yourself, okay?" - her side of the closet has also been replaced by clownwear. Doll dresses and colofurl jumpsuits all over the place! She stops rummaging for a moment and looks at you. "Dude hurry it up!" - and surprised you into putting your diaper on! "I prepped you a bottle and left it in the microwave, you should have a few sips before we go out and play..."
"A-are you my mommy?!..." - you meekly ask, and hope so.
"Aww, you poor thing!" - she approaches you and caresses your face. "I'm sorry, no! I don't get to be your mommy! I only moved in so I could take care of you! I'm Nurse Pinkyboo, the clown! Nice to meet you! And you and I are gonna be an act today!" - she pecks you a kiss in your bald head and lets go giggling. "Nurse Pinkyboo & Big Baby!" - rummages through your clothing and picks out a light blue baby jumpsuit for you to wear! It has an adorable yellow duckies pattern and complete with built-in mittens for your hands and booties for your feet! You starngely keep obliging and you both go about getting dressed in your clown costumes. You see her bury her slender body in a mock bright pink Victorian maid suit with bubble shoulders, a red cross in the center of the apron and little red hearts for buttons tied up in the back with a huge bow, ruffles hide the bloomers and striped green socks with more little red hearts pattern. She then puts on matching Mary Janes and fine soft stage white gloves and finally fixes her make-up, big dark lashes to wave and and her lips buried in red not much like your average clown but pretty much like a Pierrot. She then puts on her tiny nurse hat and poses in front of you giggling. "So, what do you think?? This is gonna be me now, the real me! And you?? Oh baby baby!..." - with the hand faster than the eye, your huge plastic toy baby bottle appears and she approches you with it! "You're Big Baby! You're a big baby is what you are! Now then, about those sips of milk!..." - and she jams the rubber nipple on your mouth forcing down the substance and your body into a seated position in the bed! Slowly, your mittens reach up as if you were ready for a struggle, but what happens instead is you grab the bottle and drink on. "Good boy!" - she giggles again hopping and clapping! She's then manages to calmly finish your costume while you drink tying up a bright yellow bib with drawings of your flower friends and the big silly matching bonnet for your jumpsuit! Once you're done with your milk you look from where you are at the nearby mirror in your ridiculous baby clown costume completed, you also notice that somehow your eyebrows have rounded into arches and you have the same red round cheeks as Pinkyboo! And finally, with a honk, your clown nose returns!

"Oooh that's just nice..." - you are surprised again by your girl, she said that in her normal tone of voice when she wants to sound sexy, almost as if she had just... "Yeah had to break out of character for this, let me tell you something baby you look just gorgeous. A new angel just got his wings...come here..." - she pulls you to your feet and walks you to the mirror so you can both see each other transformed, ready to assume your place in the world as clowns. "Look at that, look at you, look at me!" - she smiles. "We're both angels now, baby! This is who we are, this is our calling!" - she then turns to look at you and holds both your mittens. "Baby, look into my eyes..." - she says and stops smiling. "In a couple of seconds this is not gonna matter anymore but I have to apologize. I just need to. I've lied to you this whole time and don't want to think I broke your heart. You see...I was born in Clown World. And...I'm a fairy, and this whole time...me and Rasputina have been tricking you in order to transform you. Can you forgive me?"

Silence in the room after those words...

"Y-yes..." - you...squeak.
"Oh my God, that's it! You're almost finished!" - she says stunned and smiles again. "Quick, what's your name??"
"B-big Baby, t-the clown..." - you shake in your booties realizing what's happening!
"Where were you born??"
"C-clown World...n-no wait I..."
"No no that's right! You're a clown, you're a Clown World native! You were born and raised there! I would know, I'm the one who raised you! Okay now!..." - she pulls out a huge blue pacifier with the big white rubble nipple and then holds your shoulders. "I'm gonna paci you up! First you have to repeat after me the magic words: goo goo!"
"G-goo goo..."
"Gaga!"
"Gaga."
"Gababa!"
"G-gababa!"
"I want my mama!"
"I-I...I want my mama!"
And she dives into you and gives you the biggest kiss she ever gave you in your life! After she pulls out she giggles back in her squeaky clown tone. "Don't tell anyone I did! That's gonna be our big beautiful little secret! Remember, I'm a big clown, and you're just a big baby! Here's your paci!" - and she smacks it into your lips! She waits in anticipation as you slowly start sucking it up in a much bigger haze than before!

"Okay baby! It's shhhhhhowtime!" - and you leave your house for the last time on to your new life. You first become the sensation of the town as she walks you around in a large baby carriage entertaining on-lookers and all the children and pass flyers for the joke shop!

1153112111211.content: And by clown car we meant!...
1153112111211.title: 2 cars...actually!

11531121112111.content:
An hour and a half since you've been transformed into a clown! Your former girlfriend delights everyone as her sweet and happy Nurse Pinkyboo character while you suffer the most mocking laughter and finger-pointing as the overgrown Big Baby bozo! You want to break free from all this but something, other than the tightly wrapped colorful sheets with flower pattern, keeps you seated on that overgrown carriage suffering ridicule. Could it be the fact that Pinkyboo might take you to your mommy and you really really really wanna see her?? You shake off all of this realizing it's the spell transforming you further!

Not soon after a couple of seconds in which a crowd breaks off a vehicle pulls over next to the both of you. It's a huge pink van with a cartoon logo of Pinkyboo and her contact info for birthday parties! Freaking huge clown 24/7 Tons was at the wheel, both him and Pinkyboo squee in delight greeting each other with a big clown hug! "Tons!..." - she says pulling your sheets up and getting you on your booties. "I want you to meet my friend: Big Baby the clown!"
"Oh! Hoo hoo hoo, hello there, you big baby!"
"He's a new brother."
"Oh well wow, I never imagined your mom had quintoplets!"
"No no, I'm telling you he's litreally new!" - she holds your body and looks at you sweetly, Tons reacts surprised. "Yesterday another bore, today one of us!" - she kissed your nose, and the back of the van sprang open, your stomach drops as you see Rasputina coming out with a beaming smile squealing at what you've become!
"Oh my God, Pinky!..." before finishing this sentence they both kiss quickly and mutter. "Howyoudoinggirl?"
"Fineyou?"
"I'mokayeverything'sgreat- Oh my God Pinky who is this bozo?!" - she says marveling at you in delight. "What's his name?"
"Ras, I want you to meet my bestest friend in the whole wide world: Big Baby!"
"Well hello there, Big Baby! I'm Rasputina, the fairy clown! And this here's 24/7 Tons, he's a very big fun guy to have around! So..." - addressing Pinkyboo. "What were you goons up to?"
"Eh we were just doing some promo on the shop in this block, seeing as it gave this lucky costumer such fine results!"
"You guys wanna clown around with us??" - 24/7 Tons asked.
"Are you kidding?? We're only getting started!" - and you all simultaneously moved, Rasputina grabbed you and dragged you along to the back of the spacious van with crew seats around all the trinkets and jokes Pinkyboo owned on the go. Tons took your carriage folding it and after putting it away he shuts the doors closed leaving you sitting alone with the fairy right in front of you! She stares at you first, and as soon as the car sets into motion she grabs your face and takes off the paci, inspecting your face holding your chin.
"Aggg!" - you start babbling. "Agege gagaga baba!"
"Goo goo?" - she answers. "Goo goo, ga ga?" - and without waring dives in giving you a kiss in the lips! "You're one of us now, clowny!" - she says when finished and pops the soother back in your mouth. "And you look just perfect as a baby, I'll break you down soon what lifestyle you're gonna be enduring. Now then, nap time!" - and she smack you with the wand on your forehead, making you fall asleep in an instant.

You wake up...
11531121112111.title: Pinkyboo's van!

choices: She won't get over it! Why??
1153112111212.content:
After the long and busy first day of what's become your new life, your former girlfriend now turned comedic running buddy Nurse Pinkyboo parades you back to the joke shop! Although your completed transformation prevents you from breaking character, a part inside of you that is still human panics knowing this isn't a good thing, once you step through the portal and they receive you like this it'll all be over! "Tah-dah!" - Nurse Pinkyboo announces your arrival to a strangely surprised Rasputina behind the counter.
"Y-you pacied him?!" - she asks nervously approaching to see you. She's smiling, but you can tell something's off.
"That's right! Rasputina, meet my friend: Big Baby, the clown!" - she does the the honors and they are both in your face, Pinkyboo gives you a kiss in the nose and giggles while Rasputina holds your pacifier without taking it off looking at it. Then she grabs one of your mittens and pulls you up.
"Come on bozo, the least I can do is give you a beer..." - and helps you to your feet.
"What are you doing?! I can just roll him to the back! And he's a baby, he's not supposed to be drinking any of that!"
"Yes but he's also a clown, a large clown dressed like a baby! And I can tell you slaved the poor guy on his first day like a racedog! Now then...close up shop..." - she leads you to a pink dollish kitchen. "Time for some backstage carousing. We clowns get our perks too, you know!" - she says sitting you down and taking the pacifier off. "You okay?"
"Yg-g-gagabagaga!" - you say, ever confused, although you can recall from your fitst experience with this particular clown that's she's a sneaky one, she's probably lulling you into false security and knowing you can't do anything about it, you start shaking a little bit. Nothing happens, she just marvels at your transformed self quietly and then giggles a little bit. "Big Baby? That's you?" - she asks and you nod. She giggles again and looks at you with her arms crossed smiling and head shaking. She then makes her wand appear, she removes your bonnet and gives your chrome-dome a magical tap!
"Whoa!" - you squeak backing away surprised. "I...oh snap I just zoned out there for a moment!" - you say and then chuckle.
"God today was unreasonably hot!" - Rasputina says browsing the fridge, she grabs a cream pie and two beer bottles placing one on the table for you. "Here you go dude."
"Thanks pixie!" - and she leaves to confront Pinkyboo while you kick back. Upon reentry to the closed up storefront, she smacks the clown nurse with the pie right in the face.
"Hey! Where did that come from?!" - she obviously complains but Rasputina just gives her a stern look of authority. "Just what the Heck is up with you now?! What's wrong?!"
"What's wrong?! You don't follow instructions, that's what's wrong!"
"What are you talking about?!"
"Only his mom was supposed to paci him and brick his mind into it! Now I have that gallut dressed like a baby boozing in my kitchen! I have him in circus mode!"
"So!? Just tap him again back to normal and let her work it again!"
"I can't do that, Pinky! You know I can't! She's gonna find out and we won't get paid! And it's all thanks to you!"
Nurse Pinkyboo suddenly realizes the gravity of the situation and panics. "Oh crud Ras! I am so, so sorry! I just couldn't hold myself! Do you have any idea everything I had to put up with since I had agreed to move in with him?! All the things I had to resist and all the brilliant moments I had to keep to myself until now! It was hard, Rasputina! It was really hard!"
Rasputina can only sigh...
1153112111212.title: You both head back to the joke shop !

choices: They lead you to an audience with Aurora!
11531121112122.content:
"Because his mama clown is a powerful sorceress! One that was gonna help me put a stop to Aurora once and for all!" - Rasputina explains with a genuine worried look on her face and without any clown noticing, a giant purple colored octopus tentacle had crept up from the portal and wrapped itself around her! Both her and Pinkyboo squeal in total shock as it forcefully pulls her away! Flying through the back room they discover that the tentacles also got a hold on you and before entering they get a grip on the nurse clown!

The tentacles drag you all down right at the entrance to Aurora's spooky new castle locale! The trails end at vases that leave only your heads exposed, female dark jesters then come out to fit on you neck ruffles! Yours is white and blue, Pinkyboo's is pink, and Rasputina's white with purple dots, they then walk you in!
11531121112122.title: She won't get over it! Why??

115311211121222.content:
Rasputina's mind races in panic as she and her friends are lead into such a colorful room inside such a dark castle by these evil fem jesters in their checkered black and purple outfits! It looks like a dressing room for clowns with big backstage mirrors, barber shop stools, and cheerful clown figures composing the furnitures. Cocooned in vases the three of you are placed down in front of the mirrors individually, jester couples that carried Rasputina and Pinkyboo kiss them on their cheecks in unison and then smack them with cream pies out of nowhere on their faces! Pinkyboo suddenly realizes something, they are treating her like a clown which she only allows Rasputina to do, everyone else falls victims to her adorableness as a fairy clown! "No no no..." - Rasputina says and the trio watch as tubes are placed at her vase and Pinkyboos connecting and ending in faucets. They drain their magic out!
"That'll teach you to blow my sex!" - says a voice familiar to you.
"Aurora!" - you say, breaking out of circus mode, Rasputina had feared that, it's what she had wanted to prevent all along. You suddenly look at yourself surprised as you have no idea how you got yourself in this situation! The last thing you remember was you and your girlfriend getting ready for work and hoping she'd drop off with your mommy... "Gghag!" - your mind twitches in that confusion!
"Oh yeah, look at you! All that hotness buried under a ridiculous character!..." - she then grabs the container her jester minions had used to contain the clown fairy magic. "But guess what, Rasputina!? You can't beat me now! Not now, not ever! I win!" - and she jugs down the magic! In a big flash of bright lights...she turns back to normal! And she's dressed like a female ringmaster!
"Noooo!" - Rasputina screams and then turns her head down in defeat! With a grin, she rips your neck ruffle off you and gives you a huge sensous kiss! Everything then comes back to you, your real name, where you live, where you were born, and the great power that this being had just granted you! A big red smile paints itself on your mouth from cheeck to cheek that complements your arched eyebrows and huge clown nose! The jesters pull down the vase and your outfit had changed from a babyish onsie to a striped white and blue clown's jumpsuit with matching big floppy shoes! The jumpsuit then expands, as it is inflatable! Once finished, you and Aurora take a moment to stare each other at your mirror smiling while the jesters also pull down the vases of Pinkyboo and Rasputina revealing them in their baggy new jumpsuits keeping the neck ruffles! Pinky's was white with small hearts scattered and Rasputina's also white with purple dots! They get forced into the barber stools as Aurora hands you your matching pointy hat!
"Well, I'm gonna go get the car!" - you say to the girls wobbling away for a moment and giving Aurora another kiss, and then the jesters begin working with pleasant smiles! They first use scissors and then the razors and they shave Pinkyboo completely bold! Rasputina only got scrapped at the top leaving her with a daffy clown doo! Then came the make up, big red smiles and arches just like their partner! Pinkyboo got a new clown nose! And then Aurora pulled it making it longer, which also magically affected hear dome, giving it a cone shape!
"P-p-p-pinky..." - Rasputina said as she began entering a haze and Pinkyboo as well, the straps that held them on their seat come off but they don't react in utter shock as to what lowly clowns the faeries had just been reduced to. The jesters then finish up fitting them with with their new big floppy shoes. Pinkyboo manages to react surprised to them for a second until the jesters grab them and you drive back in on your new tiny clown Caddy, they get forced down in along with Aurora and some of her minions and you all drive away for fun times!
115311211121222.title: Women turned into clowns!

11531122.content: "Oh geez, what did she do to me?" - you think as you crawl up the water to see.
11531122.title: (something else)

choices: You then meet a clown-to-be on the road!
What kind of story is this?!
115311221.content:
"Quack quack??" - Rasputina asks and giggles just when you were at the water's edge, this startles you just before you see your reflection and quickly turn to...quack back! It's a rather resounding quack that mutes everything, and then you meet your knees! You are suddenly enclosed as the space shrinks and the light goes out for a moment! Until you crack through some white foam, you're in a large nest, in a well lit yellow room made up of what looked like make-believe straw for a children's TV show with plastic looking green furniture and framed portraits of cartoon ducks!

Then came your horrors: your skin had been bleached, your hair was gone and you were now smoothly shaved bald, and you wore a male chastity belt! The type that simply tuck in your member rather than exposing it caged for kinky fun. Although it was white with picures of hearts BANNED scattered, it felt strangely like normal fabric cloth but it got strong as soon as you tried pulling it out! And that's when your entire crotch area went numb!

You attempt on leaving the nest but as soon as your feet hit the ground, they squeak and magically puff into large yellow webbed feet! They looked like a rubbery and cartoonish accesory for a duck costume but it was an all-too-real new part of you covering the entire boot area! You quack freaking out and seemingly summoning Rasputina appearing on another magic puff of purple mist, her face beams pleasantly surprised at how promising you looked so far! She then instantly threw herself at you wrapping her arms and gave your lips a big kiss! "Quack quack!" - she then said before pecking your face with more kisses. "Quack quack!" - she repeated. "Quack quack quackitty quack!" - and she laughed and mocked before giving you one last peck in the lips. "Okay now, okay! Let's wrap this one up, shall we??" - she took her wand and gave a magic pokesie to your chastity belt, making puffy white bloomers with little blue bows appear! "You like them??" - she asks with genuine chirpy curiosity and really expecting an answer blinking rapidly, you answer by finally running like Hell."Oh but hold on we're not done yet!" - you hear her say and the first thing you do as soon as you leave your new bedroom is bash right into 24/7 Tons' jelly clown belly!
"Ice, ice, baby!" - he's still jamming to his retro music until he notices you half-finished as a caricature and wearing bloomers. "Oh, uh...uh-oh!..." - he looks on with not knowing what to say about that, you then again felt the shimmering blast from Rasputina's wand on your chest and you were finally suited on a big long-sleeved doll dress! It was green with little red flowers yellow at the center scattered across! The collar was scalloped, the skirt petticoated so you could show off the detail on your adorable bloomers, and ruffles on every sleeve! Still on the ground feeling this new garment and tugging at it, Rasputina fits on the matching large bonnet with a red bow displayed on your neck!
"You're one of us now." - she says holding you once finished, with a rather serious tone and look on her face, you're too astonished to even quack back at her! She then dives in for another big kiss on your lips, strangely enough your shock fades for a few seconds as you start to feel a little pleasure out of this one...along with a bizarre familiarity towards her...

As if she were trolling and noticed you were starting to enjoy yourself she withdraws suddenly and acts like a clown again looking at you mockingly stern. "Ooooh! Ohh why I oughtta!... Get up! Stand up!" - you obey and you both look comical doing this on your big clown dresses. "Ms. Quack Quack, that was very inappropriate!" - she points her finger at you. "You are no longer some big horny bruiser, you're an adorable little character in our world now and you'll behave accordingly! Tons, hold her!" - she commands and suddenly you're at the fat clown's confused grip, as you struggle Rasputina puffs out your large yellow beak. "You really liked that last kiss didn't you, silly man?" - she mocks out of character again with an evil grin, the beak is quacking all by itself until she fits it in and a you feel a huge surge of magic as it settles! Tons lets go but Ras grabs your arms quickly and finally covers your hands with soft white clown gloves! "There, all done!" - she declares and kisses the best left of your cheek! She then locks your left arm with her right and pulls you away smiling. "Tons come on! Wanna play with us??"
"Oooh hoo hoo, sure thing!"
"Well grab Ms. Quack Quack's right arm like the big fluffy gentleman that you are and let's go!..." - she opens the frontdoor of your new house outside to Clown World, she gives you another seductive grin. "Let's show her how fun Clown World can be!" - and she nonchalantly parades you around your new life!

choices: No! We can take my Clown Car
No! Floating is the Way to Go
Yes, but your feet aren't up for the task.
12.content:
In the distance you see a city, colorful and glittering in the bright sunlight. You then look up and see something that shocks you. The sun isn't like the sun you are used to, but like one in a cartoon, the light rays coming out in little triangles. All it needed was a face to be any more cartoonish.

You looked back towards the city and you started to walk towards it, wondering what kind of a place this was.

As you walked, the door behind you, leading back to your world, the real world vanished. If there was another way home you'd have to find it, but for now your curiosity was captured by the shiny colorful city.

Like Dorthy to the Emerald City, you felt like you had to go there. Then suddenly a finger taps your shoulder. You spin around and see a clown standing there. He grins, the sun glistening of the top of his partially bald head.

"Hello there" he said in a very deep silly voice "I'm Chuckles. Nice to Meet you" he said holding out a gloved hand. You shake and he smiles.

"Heading down to Clownville, are ya?" he asked.

"Is that what that place is called?" you ask of him.

"Indeed it is. Best place in the world for clowns and clown wannabes alike. Welcome!"

"Uh, is walking the easiest way to get there?"
12.title: A New World

choices: And it was walking distance alright alright!
But actually, Chuckles was setting you up for a prank!
Until a giant bird snatches you!
121.content: So you're just about to prance around with a clown!...
121.title: Following him!

1213.content:
Holy crow!

...what color is it??
1213.title: Bird is the word!

12131.content:
Whoa man, it's as if a red bird sport's mascot costume came to life growing a good set of wings and took to the skies! His claws are soft like plush but they got a real grip on you...that is until it drops you!

You land on...
12131.title: Red bird!

choices: Hope the boxes break your fall.
1213111.content:
As you fall down towards a conveniently placed open skylight, you notices big standing letters at the front of the roof spelling "SYOT" or TOYS to those viewing the letters from the front, and not plummeting to certain peril behind them.

As you pass through the skylight, you see two possible safe landing areas. One appears to be a giant mountain of plush fabric. The other is a great pile of cardboard boxes.

Which do you aim for?
1213111.title: A toy factory!

12131111.content:
*WHOOMP!*

That's the sound you hear as fluffy teddy bear stuffing flies up in all directions as you sink down into a mountain of the stuff. You breathe a sigh of relief as your terrifying plunge gives way to a soft and comfortable rest, but begin to worry again when the hole you created fills up with collapsing plush fabric. You wriggle and crawl as best you can to get out, but in your blind wriggling, you manage to wriggle out of most of your clothing. Digging down to get a footing, you eventually lay hands on what feels like the edge of a hatch. After pulling and prying for about a minute, the hatch swings open suddenly, and you fall inside.

Blinking lights surround you, and machinery starts whirring to life. Mechanical arms pick you up and stuff you into a body shaped stocking. The stocking covers your head at first, but as you feel machines stitching it up behind your back, you tear the hood of the stocking off so you can breathe easily. More arms grab your head and hold it in place as a dye spraying device closes in on your face. You shut your eyes as it begins to airbrush a pattern over you. You open your eyes again when machines start braiding your hair with long strands of heavy red yarn.

The arms pick you up again, and while you are suspended, they slip you into red and white striped tights, a blue dress with red polka dots and an attach white apron, white mittens, and black mary jane flats. The arms finally drop you onto the factory floor before retreating back into the machine.

Taking a few wobbly steps, you find yourself intact and unharmed, though confused and very soft. The stocking you've been stuffed into is very comfortable against your skin, though you feel like some plush stuffing got stuffed into it with you in certain curvy areas. As you come to a shiny metal panel, you catch your reflection, and gasp at the perfect likeness of a life sized Raggedy Anne doll.

Touching a mitten to your face, you find you're unable to smudge your red circle cheeks, lips or nose. Your black drawn-on eyelashes and freckles are equally impervious as they frame your wide eyes beneath a canopy of red yarn bangs that hang down from a wig put into giant pigtails.

The shock suddenly hits you, and your eyes involuntarily cross as you knees knock together and you flop down to the ground in a heap.

"Perfect!" shouts the clown from before as he walks into the factory, "you're absolutely perfect! Come along with me."


Where is he taking you?
12131111.title: Dive into the soft plush.

choices: The clown car of the circus
121311111.content:
He takes you by the hand and lifts you up, but you're still feeling so limp that he has to end up carrying you. Finding each carrying position awkward and cumbersome, he ends up just dumping you into a large box, closing it up, and carting the box with you inside it away to your destination. The box is actually pretty small for a person to be in, and you're twisting and squashed a bit inside it to fit. Eventually, you start to hear the murmur of voices outside the box, and what almost sounds like applause. As you contemplate this, the box is suddenly upended, and you flop out onto the ground.

All around you are bleachers filled with clowns that are watching you as you lie in the middle of a circus ring. You're so overcome by sudden stage fright that you don't know how to react, and so you just lie there until the clown who brought you here lifts you up into a standing position. When he steps away from you, your butterfly filled stomach stays limp, and your whole torso falls forward, leaving your legs standing straight as your yarn hair brushes the ground. The clowns hurries to straighten you up again and brushes the dust from your yarn. Your waist is about to bend again, but he catches you at the shoulders and lifts you, then lowers your feet to the ground again. This time, your feet slide out on the ground under your limber legs, and you drop into the splits. The clown, who held your shoulders expecting you to take your own weight, is pulled down off of his own feet and flips onto the ground beside you.

The audience laughs and claps appropriately at the rag doll act you've been putting on, and you flop your head forward slightly in a rag doll bow. You continue to let the clown try to manipulate your body into poses, always losing position when he looks away, forcing him to rush to your aid with comic consternation. At the end of the act, he packs you back into the box and carries you off as the crowd cheers and applauds.

Where does he take you now?
121311111.title: To the the circus.

choices: He helps you escape the box.
He cranks it shut again, and moves you and the box somewhere in public.
12131112.content:
*Fluump!*

That's the sound you hear as dozens of cardboard boxes crumple underneath you. Breathing a sigh of relief, you lift your head and assess the damage. You've still got ten fingers and ten toes, but sort of these boxes look irreparable. Now that you're in the pile, getting off of the pile of boxes seems the next order of business, but you're having a little difficulty there. A box might be stable at first, but once you put your weight on it, it crumples, and you lose your balance. As you try to crawl, a box under your arm folds, and you pitch head first into a box of small red balls. Lifting your head out of that box, you see that the balls are actually clown noses, and one of them got stuck over your nose. As you reach up to pull it off, the box under your other arm crumples, and you pitch forward again, this time flipping head over heels into a very large open box whose lid drops closed after you fall inside.

In the pitch darkness of the box, you press up against the lid, but it won't budge. The walls inside the box feel featureless and a few minutes of prodding blank surfaces finally lead you to the floor of the box. It feels like there might be a hole in the center of the floor, but some sort of fabric is covering it. Guiding your hands over the fabric, you find an elastic opening and step into it. A few feet down into the hole, your foot finds a stirrup of sorts. Figuring that it must be the top of a ladder, you slip you other foot into the adjacent stirrup, and pull the fabric up over your shoulders to slip past it, with the elastic band now at your neck. Lowering one of your feet, you try to find another foothold, but find nothing. You bring your searching foot back to its stirrup to rest, when you hear a chiming music begin to play around you.

The stirrups suddenly tighten and hold your feet in place. The band at you neck stiffens, and while it doesn't choke you, you can't seem to stretch it out again. Trying not to panic, you listen to the music and think about where you've heard it before. You vaguely remember it having something to do with a monkey and a weasel, when *POP!* a latch moves and the lid of the box flies open. You look up into the light, grateful for the exit, but wondering how you'll get to it. Suddenly, your whole body shoots upward as the giant spring beneath the stirrups releases and leaves you bouncing over the end of it, high above the box.

You now see what you've gotten yourself into. You're a giant Jill-in-the-box! The fabric around you is brightly striped in primary colors, and around your neck there is a frilly white ruff. You now remember the clown nose that you never pulled off as it sits where you can't reach it due to the body encasing fabric.

The clown you went walking with before stands in front of the box, chuckling at you.

"A little help here?" you ask hopefully.

"Try the sleeves." he suggests helpfully.

You do notice long sleeves draping down from either shoulder, and quickly run your arms through them, into attached white gloves at their ends. Unfortunately, stiff rods inside the sleeves prevent you from bending your arms, and you can't seem to pull your hands back through the sleeve cuffs. You impotently wave your arms furiously, bobbing back and forth atop the bouncing spring, dressed completely as a clown.

The other clown continues to laugh at you for a while, before eventually taking action.

What does he do?
12131112.title: Hope the boxes break your fall.

1213112.content: It's the Industrial Revolution in Clown World!
1213112.title: more factories

12131122.content: You see, bozos got it made b/c they have a great economy!
12131122.title: more factories

choices: Oh wait, one of the clowns in the car pulled a stunt on you!
Get your bearings first though! Ask around for some info!
122.content:
You finally notice the clown car on the scene, it looked as tiny as a golf cart yet you see a row of clowns entering it. Fascinated by this you point and laugh with Chuckles as he walks you to the car and before you know it, you're joining all the other clowns on what look like passenger seats inside a huge van. Lots of different types of clowns are there giving you welcoming smiles which for the moment keep you at ease in this bizarre situation.

Chuckles steps behind the wheel and you're off! On the way you have a pleasant conversation with a few of the lady clowns, you tell them of your situation and how you got here, they seem either genuinely clueless or they're just messing with you about what they know staying in their clown nature.

"Weeeeeeeee're here!" - Chuckles announces, and you march alongside the other clowns out into Clownville! It was everything Chuckles had described and you were immediately happily surprised, it's like you made it to an amusement park or the circus! Clowns everywhere in a colorful valley town! All of them smiling, either prancing to different places greeting you or standing around in groups doing really funny act and tricks to each other or having pie fights!

This was fun! You wanna make the most of it so you decide to explore!
122.title: No! We can take my Clown Car

choices: They replaced a piece of your clothing!
1221.title: Wait a minute...

choices: That clown still in the car!
12211.content: Quick, look around! Who has it?!
12211.title: They took your wallet!

choices: It's a sailor clown in blue!
It's a nun clown in pink!
122111.content: You jump back in to get your wallet back, what does the clown holding it look like?
122111.title: No clown left behind!

1221111.content:
"Oh hi!" - says the whiteface red orb nosed sailor in blue wearing white gloves and red sneakers, you are shocked to hear her very feminine voice as she greets you lifting her round white sailor hat revealing a chrome dome of a head. "This you?" - she hands you back your wallet, it's half opened and your voting ID is sticking out. Looks like she eavesdropped on your personal info!

"Gha!" - out of nowhere, an ordinary person bolts in. "Drive! Drive me out of here! I want out!"
"Yeargh!" - suddenly, a lady, and she requests the same thing. Then another guy shows up, and another girl. And then another. Then another! And another! In a matter of minutes, Chuckles and the sailor are the only clowns in the car. Every normie is sitting tight requesting to be taken out of this place, the sailor nods with a smile and before you can do anything Chuckles obliges and you are on the road!

Boy that was quick, now where we're going?
1221111.title: Noij eht nwolc yvan!

1223.content: "Chuckles," You ask, "Who should I talk to about..."
1223.title: Get your bearings first though! Ask around for ...

choices: Carefully sneak over to the pie tray!
Ask for some tips from a pro!
12231.content:
"...pies? Clowns are used to being hit with pies, right? I've always wanted to throw a pie at someone!" You exclaim excitably.

Chuckles squints and takes a close look around. "Hmm, Tunia doesn't look very busy," he says, gesturing to a clown stretching in the distance next to a tray full of pies. She's wearing a bright, poofy skirt with a matching top and a long florescent pink wig worn in pig tails. It's hard to tell, but you think you can see flowers all over her costume and in her hair.

'She looks like fun! I'm sure she'll be able to help me.' You think to yourself, as you thank Chuckles and make your way over to her.

As you walk towards her you wonder about how to approach her. 'I can't just walk up to her and ask 'Hey, mind if I throw a pie at you?' She'll think I'm a crazy person!'

Instead, you...
12231.title: Who's that?

122311.content:
Tip-toeing with as much stealth as you can muster, you sidle up to the cart and take a gander at all the colorful creamy confections. Selecting a pie with a particularly tall mound of blue fluffy topping, you slide your hand under it and creep up behind Tunia. Picturing her surprised face and the explosion of cream to come, to reach out and tap her on the shoulder.

Nothing happens. She doesn't turn, so instead of pelting her with the pie, you just stand there in frustrated anticipation. Reaching out again, you tap her shoulder with a bit more force.

She wobbles. Something in the way she wobbles makes you suspicious, and you walk around her to investigate.

She's a dummy. Rather, it's a mannequin in a clown outfit and wig, and you're the one who feels like a dummy. A tap on your shoulder leads you to turn away from the decoy.

*SPLAT!*

The real Tunia just served you your just desserts! Pie drips down your front and Tunia points and giggles at you as you wipe the cream from your eyes with your free hand. You smirk ruefully at becoming a victim of your own intentions, but now you can see Tunia clearly in front of you, and you still have your big blue pie in your hand.
122311.title: Carefully sneak over to the pie tray!

choices: Ask to borrow something from Tunia.
1223111.content:
With thoughts of sweet revenge driving you, you lift the pie high, then lean forward push right towards Tunia's face with your.. empty hand!?

The pie is gone. You had it a second ago. You look to the ground to see if it fell, but don't see it. You look up-

*SPLAT!*

Blue pie mingles with pink as your face is covered once again. Tunia is laughing at you again, and the throaty chortle of Chuckles joins her from behind you.

You should have known better than to out clown a professional prankstress, and now you look like a fool. Taking your time, you wipe most of the cream from your face and hair. Looking down out your outfit, you can see you're still a complete mess.

"Can you help me wash up," you ask the pair of clowns who continue to grin at your expense.

*SPLASH!*

They responded by dousing you with a pair of water filled fire buckets.

Bedraggled and dripping, you realize it's time to change clothes.
1223111.title: Let her have it!

choices: He Trips and lets go of you!
You arrive at the Clown City.
123.content:
You laughed at this. "Float. I don't see anything to float with."

"Easily Fixed!" giggled Chuckles as he pulled out what appeared to be a helium tank...seemingly pulling it from thin air. He took the hose attached to the tank, and before you could maneuver away, shoved it right in your mouth.

You felt an odd tingle and then you felt your body filling with helium as you started to expand, growing rounder and rounder and you began to float. Oddly your clothes had grown round with you.

Soon your body was entirely spherical except for your head, feet, and hands.

"Perfect" he said with a giggle as he unhooked the hose, and you began to float up. He grabbed you by the big toe, and tied a string to it, and carried you along as he walked towards the city in the distance. He chuckled to himself as he did.

Just then...
123.title: Flotation Device.

choices: down the winding road to Clownville.
off the road in a straight line towards the shining city of Clownville.
over the hill to investigate that strange music.
124.content:
-At least, not in those shoes they're not."

"What do you mean?" you ask, feeling a little self-conscious about your old Keds, "I hike in these all the time."

In fact, you are wearing one of your favorite hiking outfits right now. You are wearing a faded t-shirt and loose cotton blouse, hip hugging jean shorts, and a pair of well-worn Keds sneakers with thick socks. It's not a particularly glamorous getup, but it's comfortable and has suited your needs exploring countless nature trails.

"How can you even walk in those things without falling over?" asked Chuckles with sincere wonder, "you need steady shoes with a nice wide, grounded sole like mine."

You look down at the clown's shoes and can't help but giggle. Even for a clown, his shoes seem overly large. They could clearly be effective snow shoes, or even tennis rackets, with their 16 inch wide toe areas that round back to a merely oversized boot tops, all of which are dressed in vinyl in every color of the rainbow.

Happy to demonstrate the function of normal shoes to your funny friend, you tell Chuckles, "I can walk just fine in these, thank you. Just watch."

Feeling silly and sassy, you proceed to do your best impression of a model's trip down the catwalk. Swinging your hips with your right hand miming that it dangles the most exquisite of little purses, you make to the end the stage, spin to face Chuckles, pose dramatically, take another confident step, and give a slight shriek as you feel your heels lift high into the air, one of them carrying a banana peel that you could have sworn wasn't there a second ago.

Your back hits the soft ground and you let out an "oouff!" as you are reintroduced to the effects of gravity. Your hair cascades down into your face and you leave it there a moment as you catch your breath. While blinded by your hair, you suddenly notice that you feet feel a little colder. You sweep your locks from your eyes and gaze upon your now bare feet. Your Keds and socks are nowhere to be seen, but Chuckles appears to be proffering a substitute in his own style.

"I told you so, didn't I? Those little things would never have gotten you all the way to Clownville, but these are just the ticket. Take them with my compliments."

The clown hands you what appear to be the estranged relatives of mary janes. With a wide vinyl strap just below the ankle, they boast an inch high heel and an eight inch wide toe. White polka dots an otherwise pink surface. Atop the toes are two cute little vinyl bows in red. In addition to the shoes, Chuckles gives a pair of red and white striped thigh high stockings. You hesitate to put them on, but then consider the prospect of exposing your bare feet to this strange terrain and shrug away your concerns and fashion fears and embrace the funny footwear.

The stockings somehow make your legs feel more exposed, but you know the shoes would feel wrong in bare feet. The shoes fit like a dream, offering a cushy heel and snug toe area (most of the toe has padding inside of it). You get to your feet and take a few experimental steps. Though you have to swing your legs out a bit at each step to keep from bumping your shoes into each other, you feel stable and at home in your new clown shoes.

"Thank you very much for the gifts," you say to Chuckles, or rather would have, if he hadn't disappeared while you were testing out your presents.

The land seems quiet except the soft sound of a calliope over the nearby hill.

You put your new shoes to work and you walk
124.title: Yes, but your feet aren't up for the task.

12431.content:
A colorful little cottage sits cheerfully puffing small clouds of smoke from its chimney pipes on the far side of the hill. In the air, you catch the fragrance of freshly made sweet confections, and the sign hanging from the awning confirms what you're smelling: you've stumbled upon a bakery. The enticing smell has convinced you to indulge in a baked good. A menu lays on a charming little table between two chairs, one unadorned, and the other with an overstuffed cushion on the seat.

Which will you sit on?
12431.title: Bakery!

choices: Beg the waiter for something to wear.
124312.content:
Being suspect of the nature of that cushion, you sit on the chair with no cushion, and peruse the menu. After a moment, you adjust your posture, and you hear a ripping sound come from your chair seat. When you stand up to see what ripped, you look down at the chair to find your shorts still glued to the seat, and realize your panties are now expose to the world.
Just then, a clown waiter steps out of the bakery to take your order. He double takes at the sight of your underwear, then hides his face in his hands (which had the misfortune to be holding a tray of tarts at the time). You squeak with surprise and embarrassment as you use the menu in your hands to hide your shame.

What will you do now?
124312.title: The uncushioned chair

choices: Serve pastries to the clown customers
1243122.content:
The clown waiter slowly lowers the tray, and you stifle a giggle as you see his face and shoulders are now plastered with an assortment of tarts. You bite your lip to stay quiet as he carefully swipes and flicks pastry from his eyes and mouth. A breeze passes behind you, and you are reminded of your wardrobe malfunction, and your urgent wish to rectify it.

First, you ask him if he has a spare pair of pants. He doesn't. Next, you ask if you can borrow his apron (pristine, despite the mess on his shoulders). He refuses, but suggests you follow him to fetch another one. Keeping the menu in front of you, you follow him inside.

Passing empty tables, you follow him into the kitchen area, where he retrieves a garment from a closet. It is indeed an apron, though it's attached to a very colorful, frilly dress with attached petticoats and a pair of polka dot bloomers sewn on as well. Between dressing like a clown among clowns, and prancing around this strange world in your underwear, you quickly choose to wear the dress. Ditching your blouse and t-shirt, you step into the getup and straighten it out around you. You are now clad completely as a colorful clown from your neck ruff down to your bubble-toed shoes. The waiter zips you up and then offers you a choice.

He'll let you keep the dress if you help him out with the lunchtime rush. You can choose either to work in the kitchen, or wait on tables.

Where will you work?
1243122.title: Beg the waiter for something to wear.

info.brief_description: Welcome to a place where everyone is a silly clown, and you might just be joining them!
info.description:
You find a strange Joke Shop in town, and inside you are transported to a strange new world, a world full of Clowns...

Journey through this new place, and watch what happens as you explore, and possibly join their silly culture.

UPDATE: Read the Short Story Inspired by this Interactive! Clowntopia: The Storefront introduces the world of Clowntopia (aka Clown World) that was created here!

http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/1622275-Clowntopia-The-Storefront
